tasks.description: This task is used to create / delete / modify the specified F5 Object. It can generate commands or execute the operation immediately

notificationMessage.0: Please Wait. F5 Task is in progress

tasks.scriptContent:
#------------------------------------------------------
# TASK DESCRIPTION 
#------------------------------------------------------
'''
Operation Type     : create / delete / modify 
Module         : ltm
Object         : virtual




This OOB Task is to create / delete / modify the virtual in the module ltm. ( Type of operation to be specified in 'operation_type' )

     - "is_deferred_execution" flag can be set to generate the commands or unset to execute immediately for carrying out the required operation with in the workflow.
     - "is_rollback" can be set along with 'rollback_input' to carryout the rollback operation. ( ' rollback ' of previous execution to be fed to ' rollback_input' ) 
     - "is_skip_required" flag can be set to skip the execution of this task in the work flow.
     - "is_stop_workflow_on_failure" flag can be set to stop the workflow execution in case of failure.
     - "tabular_input" ( list of json ) can be used for carrying out multiple object operations, with same input json format in a list.
     - Using the tabular input the actions can be mixed, like create and modify actions can be carried out in one go as well as the rollback of them 
     - Prevalidation and Postvalidation will be carried out before and after implementation
'''


#------------------------------------------------------
# INPUT DETAILS 
#------------------------------------------------------
'''
[
    { 'field_name' : 'operation_type',    'is_mandatory' : true,    'description' : 'Specify the operation to be carried out on the object ( create / modify / delete )' ,    'type' : 'string'},    
    { 'field_name' : 'device_name',    'is_mandatory' : true,    'description' : 'Device Name managed by AppViewX' ,    'type' : 'string','supported_operations':'create / modify / delete'},    
    { 'field_name' : 'is_rollback',    'is_mandatory' : false,    'description' : 'Flag to carryout the rollback' ,    'type' : 'json','supported_operations':'create / modify / delete'},    
    { 'field_name' : 'is_deferred_execution',    'is_mandatory' : false,    'description' : 'Flag to carryout the deferred execution' ,    'type' : 'string','supported_operations':'create / modify / delete'},    
    { 'field_name' : 'is_skip_required','is_mandatory' : false,    'description' : 'Set this flag to skip the task execution ( default False )' ,    'type' : 'bool','supported_operations':'create / modify / delete'},        
    { 'field_name' : 'is_stop_workflow_on_failure','is_mandatory' : false,    'description' : 'Set this flag to stop the workflow on failure of this task ( default False )' ,    'type' : 'bool','supported_operations':'create / modify / delete'},    
    { 'field_name' : 'rollback_input','is_mandatory' : false,    'description' : 'Input data for the rollback' ,    'type' : 'string','supported_operations':'create / modify / delete'},    
    { 'field_name' : 'tabular_input','is_mandatory' : false,    'description' : 'Input data for the rollback' ,    'type' : 'json','supported_operations':'create / modify / delete'},    

    { 'field_name' : 'name','is_mandatory' : true,    'description' : 'Name of the Object' ,    'type' : 'string','supported_operations':'create / modify / delete'},    
    { 'field_name' : 'enabled','is_mandatory' : false,    'description' : 'Set this flag to enable the object' ,    'type' : 'bool','supported_operations':'create / modify '},    
    { 'field_name' : 'all', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies that you want to modify all of the existing components of the specified type.', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'address-status', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies whether the virtual will contribute to the operational status of the associated virtual-address. The default value is 'yes'.', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'app-service', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies the name of the application service to which the virtual server belongs. The default value is ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'auth', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies a list of authentication profile names, separated by spaces, that the virtual server uses to manage authentication.', 'type' : 'json / string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'auto-lasthop', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : '', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'clone-pools', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies a pool or list of pools that the virtual server uses to replicate either client or server traffic. You must specify a value of either ', 'type' : 'json / string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'cmp-enabled', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Enables or disables clustered multi-processor (CMP) acceleration. This feature applies to certain platforms only. The default value is ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'connection-limit', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies the maximum number of concurrent connections you want to allow for the virtual server. The default value of ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'dhcp-relay', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies a virtual server that relays all received dhcp requests to all pool members. If there is no pool, the received request get dropped. If you specify the ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'description', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'User defined description.', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'destination', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies the name of the virtual address and service on which the virtual server listens for connections.', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'disabled', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : '', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'fallback-persistence', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies a fallback persistence profile for the virtual server to use when the default persistence profile is not available. The default value is ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'flow-eviction-policy', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies a flow eviction policy for the virtual server to use, to select which flows to terminate when the number of connections approaches the connection limit on the virtual server. The default value is ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'fw-enforced-policy', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies an enforced firewall policy. ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'fw-staged-policy', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies a staged firewall policy. ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'gtm-score', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies a score that is associated with the virtual server. Global Traffic Manager (GTM) can rely on this value to load balance traffic in a proportional manner.', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'ip-forward', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies a virtual server that has no pool members to load balance, but instead, forwards the packet directly to the destination IP address specified in the client request. If you specify the ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'ip-protocol', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies the IP protocol for which you want the virtual server to direct traffic. Sample protocol names are TCP and UDP. The default value is ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'internal', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies an internal virtual server that handles requests for a parent virtual server, such as content adaptation. Internal virtual servers do not receive external connections, instead they are specified by name by profiles in the parent virtual server (see ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'l2-forward', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies a virtual server that shares the same IP address as a node in an associated VLAN. You create this type of virtual server when you want to create a VLAN group. If you specify the ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'last-hop-pool', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies the name of the last hop pool that you want the virtual server to use to direct reply traffic to the last hop router. The default value is ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'mask', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies the netmask for a network virtual server only. This setting is required for a network virtual server.', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'mirror', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Enables or disables mirroring. You can use mirroring to maintain the same state information in the standby unit that is in the active unit, allowing transactions such as FTP file transfers to continue as though uninterrupted. The default value is ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'nat64', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Enable or disable NAT64. The default value is ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'per-flow-request-access-policy', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies the name of the per-request access policy to be used with the virtual server. The default value is ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'persist', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies a list of profiles separated by spaces that the virtual server uses to manage connection persistence. The default value is ', 'type' : 'json / string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'policies', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Manage LTM Policies applied to the virtual server. LTM Policies define a setof conditions and actions that can be used to inspect, modify, direct traffic,and enable/disable features on the fly, similar to iRules. LTMPolicies do not require programming. See also ', 'type' : 'json', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'pool', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies the name of a LSN or SNAT pool used by the specified virtual server.', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'profiles', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies a list of profiles for the virtual server to use to direct and manage traffic. The default value is ', 'type' : 'json / string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'rate-class', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies the name of an existing rate class that you want the virtual server to use to enforce a throughput policy for incoming network traffic. The default value is ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'rate-limit', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies the maximum number of connections per second allowed for a virtualserver. The default value is 'disabled'.', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'rate-limit-mode', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Indicates whether the rate limit is applied per virtual object, per sourceaddress, per destination address, or some combination thereof. The defaultvalue is 'object', which does not use the source or destination address aspart of the key.', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'rate-limit-dst', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : '', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'rate-limit-src', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : '', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'related-rules', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies a list of iRules, separated by spaces, that customize the behavior of secondary channels (for instance the data channel on FTP) opened on behalf of the virtual server. The default value is ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'reject', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies that the BIG-IP(r) system rejects any traffic destined for the virtual server IP address. If you specify the ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'rules', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies a list of iRules, separated by spaces, that customize the virtual server to direct and manage traffic. The default value is ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'security-nat-policy', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Configures the following options to specify which Security NAT Policy is tobe used to match the incoming traffic and perform source/destinationtranslation (address/port) using the first-match rule criteria:', 'type' : 'json', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'service-down-immediate-action', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies the immediate action the BIG-IP system should respond with upon the receipt of the initial client's SYN packet if the availability status of the virtual server is Offline or Unavailable. This is supported for the virtual server of ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'service-policy', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies a service policy for the virtual server. If set, it will enforce the service policy for incoming network traffic. The service policy can be used to validate if incoming traffic conforms to a set of application protocols.', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'snat', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies the use of a SNAT pool of translation addresses for virtual server source address translation.', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'snatpool', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies the name of an existing SNAT pool that you want the virtual server to use to implement selective and intelligent SNATs.This attribute is DEPRECATED. Use ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'source', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies an IP address or network from which the virtual server will accept traffic.', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'source-address-translation', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies the type of source address translation enabled for the virtual server as well as the pool that the source address translation will use.', 'type' : 'json', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'source-port', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies whether the system preserves the source port of the connection. The default value is ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'traffic-classes', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies a list of traffic classes that are associated with the virtual server. The default value is ', 'type' : 'json / string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'translate-address', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Enables or disables address translation for the virtual server. Disable address translation for a virtual server if you want to use the virtual server to load balance connections to any address. This option is useful when the system is load balancing devices that have the same IP address. The default value is ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'translate-port', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Enables or disables port translation. Disable port translation for a virtual server, if you want to use the virtual server to load balance connections to any service. The default value is ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'transparent-nexthop', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies the egress interface for traffic and enables layer 2 (MAC) address preservation.  Layer 2 address preservation disables layer 3 (IP/IPv6) address translation.', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'vlans', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies a list of VLANs on which the virtual server is either enabled or disabled. The default value is ', 'type' : 'json / string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'vlans-disabled', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Disables the virtual server on the VLANs specified in the ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'vlans-enabled', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Enables the virtual server on the VLANs specified in the ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'metadata', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Associates user defined data, each of which has name and value pair and persistence. Persistent(default) means the data will be saved into config file.', 'type' : 'json', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
]
'''

}

def output_util(input,status):
    log_util('Main - '+str(input),True)
    if status!=None:
        AVX::OUTPUT(input,status)
    else:
        AVX::OUTPUT(input)

def log_util(input_str,is_studio_log):
    if IS_DETAILED_LOG_IN_FILE:
        logger.info(input_str)
    if is_studio_log:
        AVX::LOG(input_str)

# action - task action like create / delete / modify
# activity - pre_validation, implementation, post_validation, rollback
def carry_out_action_wise_object_activity(activity,input_dict):
    log_util('carry_out_action_wise_object_activity - carry_out_action_wise_object_activity - input_dict :'+str(input_dict),False)

    operation_type = input_dict['operation_type']
    response = command_repo_connector.command_repo_connector(session_id,device_response_error_check[operation_type][activity]['indent'],input_dict['is_deferred_execution'],{k:v for k,v in input_dict.items() if v is not None})
    if input_dict['is_deferred_execution']:
        return response
    elif ( device_response_error_check[operation_type][activity]['availability'] and any(error in str(response['data']) for error in device_response_error_check[operation_type][activity]['list_of_messages']) ) or ( ( not device_response_error_check[operation_type][activity]['availability'] ) and ( not any(error in str(response['data']) for error in device_response_error_check[operation_type][activity]['list_of_messages']))):
        return response
    else:
        raise Exception('Error :' + input_dict['name'] + str(response['data']))

#Method to handle partial rollback
def partial_rollback(input_dict):
    operation_type = input_dict['operation_type']
    return command_repo_connector.command_repo_connector(session_id,device_response_error_check[operation_type]['rollback']['indent'],True,{k:v for k,v in input_dict.items() if v is not None})

def get_config_from_device(input_dict,is_deferred_execution):
    return command_repo_connector.command_repo_connector(session_id,command_repo_indent_list,is_deferred_execution,{k:v for k,v in input_dict.items() if v is not None})

def get_config_for_all_properties_from_device(input_dict,is_deferred_execution):
    payload = {k:v for k,v in input_dict.items() if v is not None}
    payload['all_properties'] = True
    return command_repo_connector.command_repo_connector(session_id,command_repo_indent_list,is_deferred_execution,payload)

def get_non_none_and_generic(input):
    input_with_non_none = {k:v for k,v in input.items() if ( (v is not None ) and ( v is not ''))}
    for key in generic_keys_for_the_task:        
        if key in input_with_non_none:
            del input_with_non_none[key]
    return input_with_non_none

#Method to handle rollback
def execute_rollback(rollback_input,is_skip_deferred):
    output = []        
    for rollback_dict in rollback_input:
        log_util('execute_rollback - Executing rollback for the input :'+str(rollback_dict),False)
        input_dict = rollback_dict['input_dict']
        device_name = input_dict['device_name']
        input_dict['is_deferred_execution'] = input_dict['is_deferred_execution'] if 'is_deferred_execution' in input_dict else None
        if is_skip_deferred and  input_dict['is_deferred_execution']:
            continue
        operation_type = input_dict['operation_type']
        current_output_dict = {}
        current_output_dict['device_name'] = input_dict['device_name']
        current_output_dict['operation_type'] = input_dict['operation_type']
        modify_dict_with_out_none_and_generic_fields = get_non_none_and_generic(input_dict)
        if input_dict['operation_type'] == 'create':
            response = command_repo_connector.command_repo_connector(session_id,device_response_error_check[operation_type]['rollback']['indent'],input_dict['is_deferred_execution'],{k:v for k,v in input_dict.items() if v is not None})
        elif input_dict['operation_type'] == 'modify':
            command_from_util = diff_util_modify_delete_rollback.get_modification_rollback_command(rollback_dict['config_before_modification_all_properties'],rollback_dict['config_before_modification'],modify_dict_with_out_none_and_generic_fields.keys(),list_of_fields_with_replace_all_with_properties,list_of_fields_to_be_ignored_during_rollback,list_of_fields_to_be_considered_during_rollback)
            command_from_util = 'modify '+module+' ' + object_type + get_record_type_command(input_dict) + input_dict['name']+' {'+command_from_util+' }'
            if input_dict['is_bash_shell']:
                command_from_util = 'tmsh '+command_from_util
            form_fields_command_repo = {'device_name':device_name,'command':command_from_util}
            if input_dict['is_deferred_execution']:
                response = {'commands':[command_from_util],'data':[]}
            else:
                response = command_repo_connector.command_repo_connector(session_id,device_response_error_check[operation_type]['rollback']['indent'],input_dict['is_deferred_execution'],form_fields_command_repo)
        elif input_dict['operation_type'] == 'delete':
            command_from_util = diff_util_modify_delete_rollback.get_delete_rollback_command(rollback_dict['config_before_modification'],list_of_fields_with_replace_all_with_properties,list_of_fields_to_be_ignored_during_rollback)
            command_from_util = 'create '+module+' ' + object_type + get_record_type_command(input_dict) + input_dict['name'] +' {'+command_from_util+' }'
            if input_dict['is_bash_shell']:
                command_from_util = 'tmsh '+command_from_util
            form_fields_command_repo = {'device_name':device_name,'command':command_from_util}
            if input_dict['is_deferred_execution']:
                response = {'commands':[command_from_util],'data':[]}
            else:
                response = command_repo_connector.command_repo_connector(session_id,device_response_error_check[operation_type]['rollback']['indent'],input_dict['is_deferred_execution'],form_fields_command_repo)

        current_output_dict['commands'] = response['commands'] if len(response['commands']) > 0 and input_dict['is_deferred_execution'] else []
        current_output_dict['data'] = response['data'] if len(response['data']) > 0 else []
        log_util('execute_rollback - Current Rollback output :'+str(current_output_dict),False)    
        output.append(current_output_dict)
    log_util('execute_rollback - Rollback Finished ',True)
    return output

def get_record_type_command(input):
    if 'record_type' in input:
        return ' '+input['record_type'] if ( input['record_type'] != None and input['record_type'] != '' ) else ' '
    else:
        return ' '

def carry_out_implementation_activity_for_tabular_input(tabular_input,output):
    log_util('carry_out_implementation_activity_for_tabular_input - Started Implementation',True)
    activity_output = []
    i = 0
    for input_dict in tabular_input:
        log_util('carry_out_implementation_activity_for_tabular_input - Processing input_dict - Operation Type : '+str(input_dict['operation_type']),True)
        log_util('carry_out_implementation_activity_for_tabular_input - input_dict :'+str(input_dict),True)

        rollback_for_current_input_dict = {}        
        rollback_for_current_input_dict['input_dict'] = input_dict
        rollback_for_current_input_dict['config_before_modification'] = output['pre_validation'][i]['data'][0]
        i = i+1

        config_for_all_properties = get_config_for_all_properties_from_device(input_dict,False)['data'][0]
        log_util('carry_out_implementation_activity_for_tabular_input - config_for_all_properties :'+str(config_for_all_properties),False)
        
        #Removing unwanted content from list all-properties
        if module+' ' + object_type + get_record_type_command(input_dict) + input_dict['name'] in config_for_all_properties:
            config_for_all_properties = config_for_all_properties[config_for_all_properties.index(module+' '+object_type+get_record_type_command(input_dict)+input_dict['name']):]

        rollback_for_current_input_dict['config_before_modification_all_properties'] = config_for_all_properties

        output_from_command_repo = carry_out_action_wise_object_activity('implementation',input_dict)
        log_util('carry_out_implementation_activity_for_tabular_input - output_from_command_repo'+str(output_from_command_repo),True)
        if(not input_dict['is_deferred_execution']):
            config = get_config_from_device(input_dict,input_dict['is_deferred_execution'])
            rollback_for_current_input_dict['config_after_modification'] = config['data'][0]

        output_dict = {}
        output_dict['device_name'] = input_dict['device_name']
        output_dict['data'] = output_from_command_repo['data']
        output_dict['commands'] = output_from_command_repo['commands'] if input_dict['is_deferred_execution'] else []
        output_dict['operation_type'] = input_dict['operation_type']
        log_util('carry_out_implementation_activity_for_tabular_input - Implementation Output Dict :'+str(output_dict),False)
        log_util('carry_out_implementation_activity_for_tabular_input - rollback_for_current_input_dict :'+str(rollback_for_current_input_dict),False)

        activity_output.append(output_dict)

        output['rollback'].append(rollback_for_current_input_dict)
        output['object_names'].append(input_dict['name'])

    log_util('carry_out_implementation_activity_for_tabular_input - Finished Implementation',True)
    return activity_output

def carry_out_pre_validation_activity_for_tabular_input(tabular_input):
    log_util('carry_out_pre_validation_activity_for_tabular_input - Carrying out pre_validation',True)
    activity_output = []
    for input_dict in tabular_input:
        config_data = get_config_from_device(input_dict,False)
        output_dict = {}
        output_dict['device_name'] = input_dict['device_name']
        output_dict['data'] = config_data['data']
        output_dict['commands'] = config_data['commands'] if input_dict['is_deferred_execution'] else []
        output_dict['operation_type'] = input_dict['operation_type']
        activity_output.append(output_dict)
        log_util('carry_out_pre_validation_activity_for_tabular_input - Validation Output :'+str(output_dict),False)
    log_util('carry_out_pre_validation_activity_for_tabular_input - Finished pre_validation',True)
    return activity_output

def carry_out_post_validation_activity_for_tabular_input(tabular_input):
    log_util('carry_out_post_validation_activity_for_tabular_input - Carrying out post_validation',True)
    activity_output = []
    for input_dict in tabular_input:
        config_data = get_config_from_device(input_dict,input_dict['is_deferred_execution'])
        output_dict = {}
        output_dict['device_name'] = input_dict['device_name']
        output_dict['data'] = config_data['data']
        output_dict['commands'] = config_data['commands'] if input_dict['is_deferred_execution'] else []
        output_dict['operation_type'] = input_dict['operation_type']
        activity_output.append(output_dict)
        log_util('carry_out_post_validation_activity_for_tabular_input - Validation Output :'+str(output_dict),False)
    log_util('carry_out_post_validation_activity_for_tabular_input - Finished post_validation',True)
    return activity_output

def generate_partial_rollback_commands(rollback_input):
    log_util('generate_partial_rollback_commands - Started generation of partial rollback commands',True)
    output = []        
    for rollback_dict in rollback_input:
        log_util('generate_partial_rollback_commands_from_rollback - Generating Partial Rollback Command :'+str(rollback_dict),False)
        input_dict = rollback_dict['input_dict']
        device_name = input_dict['device_name']
        operation_type = input_dict['operation_type']

        current_output_dict = {}
        current_output_dict['device_name'] = input_dict['device_name']
        current_output_dict['operation_type'] = input_dict['operation_type']
        modify_dict_with_out_none_and_generic_fields = get_non_none_and_generic(input_dict)
        if input_dict['operation_type'] == 'create':
            response = command_repo_connector.command_repo_connector(session_id,device_response_error_check[operation_type]['rollback']['indent'],True,{k:v for k,v in input_dict.items() if v is not None})
            current_output_dict['commands'] = response['commands'] if len(response['commands']) > 0 else []
            current_output_dict['data'] = response['data'] if len(response['data']) > 0 else []

        elif input_dict['operation_type'] == 'modify':
            command_from_util = diff_util_modify_delete_rollback.get_modification_rollback_command(rollback_dict['config_before_modification_all_properties'],rollback_dict['config_before_modification'],modify_dict_with_out_none_and_generic_fields.keys(),list_of_fields_with_replace_all_with_properties,list_of_fields_to_be_ignored_during_rollback,list_of_fields_to_be_considered_during_rollback)
            command_from_util = 'modify '+module+' ' + object_type + ' ' +get_record_type_command(input_dict) + ' ' +input_dict['name']+' {'+command_from_util+' }'
            if input_dict['is_bash_shell']:
                command_from_util = 'tmsh '+command_from_util
                
            current_output_dict['commands'] = [command_from_util]
            current_output_dict['data'] = []
            

        elif input_dict['operation_type'] == 'delete':
            command_from_util = diff_util_modify_delete_rollback.get_delete_rollback_command(rollback_dict['config_before_modification'],list_of_fields_with_replace_all_with_properties,list_of_fields_to_be_ignored_during_rollback)
            command_from_util = 'create '+module+' ' + object_type + ' ' +get_record_type_command(input_dict) + ' ' +input_dict['name']+' {'+command_from_util+' }'            
            if input_dict['is_bash_shell']:
                command_from_util = 'tmsh '+command_from_util

            current_output_dict['commands'] = [command_from_util]
            current_output_dict['data'] = []
        
        log_util('execute_rollback - Current Rollback output :'+str(current_output_dict),False)    
        output.append(current_output_dict)
    log_util('execute_rollback - Rollback Finished ',True)
    return output

def set_skip_message(output):
    output['status'] = 'skipped'
    output['message'] = 'task execution skipped'
    output_util(output,None)

def get_pre_validation_status(list_of_pre_validation_input):
    log_util('get_pre_validation_status - Started pre_validation status',True)
    pre_validation_status = True

    for pre_validation_input in list_of_pre_validation_input:
        log_util('get_pre_validation_status - Processing pre_validation_input :'+str(pre_validation_input),False)
        operation_type = pre_validation_input['operation_type']
        current_status =  ( device_response_error_check[operation_type]['pre_validation']['availability'] and any(error in str(pre_validation_input['data']) for error in device_response_error_check[operation_type]['pre_validation']['list_of_messages']) ) or ( ( not device_response_error_check[operation_type]['pre_validation']['availability'] ) and ( not any(error in str(pre_validation_input['data']) for error in device_response_error_check[operation_type]['pre_validation']['list_of_messages'])))
        pre_validation_status = pre_validation_status and current_status        
        log_util('get_pre_validation_status - pre_validation_status :'+str(pre_validation_status),True)

        if not pre_validation_status:
            log_util('get_pre_validation_status - Pre validation failed in Data :'+str(pre_validation_input['data'])+' Command :'+str(pre_validation_input['commands'])+' Data : '+str(pre_validation_input),True)
            break;
    log_util('get_pre_validation_status - Finished pre_validation status',True)
    return pre_validation_status

def is_input_validation_success(input_data_dict):
    output = True
    log_util('Started validating user input ',True)
    for input_dict in input_data_dict:
        if ( 'enabled' in input_dict and 'disabled' in input_dict ) and ( ((True if input_dict['enabled'] else False) and (True if input_dict['disabled'] else False) ))  :
            output = False
            log_util('enable disable bot are set to true :'+str(input_dict),True)
    log_util('Completed validating user input ',True)
    return output

if __name__ == '__main__':
    log_util('Main - Started Task : ltm-virtual',True)
    output = {}    
    #Rollback with sequence number in the forward flow of execution    
    input_dict_main = {}

    
    try:
        #Get the input from the global
        input_dict_main = generate_input()

        if input_dict_main['is_skip_required']:
            log_util('Main - Skipping the Task Execution',True)
            #To skip the task execution
            set_skip_message(output)
        else:
            #Handle tabular input
            input_data_dict = process_tabular_data(input_dict_main)

            input_validation_status = is_input_validation_success(input_data_dict)

            if not input_validation_status:
                log_util('User input validation failed',True)
                output['status'] = 'failed'
                output_util(output,2 if input_dict_main['is_stop_workflow_on_failure'] else None)
            elif not input_dict_main['is_rollback']:
                log_util('Main - Implementation Action :'+str(input_dict_main['operation_type'])+' started ',True)
                output['rollback'] = []
                output['object_names'] = []

                output['pre_validation'] = carry_out_pre_validation_activity_for_tabular_input(input_data_dict)
                pre_validation_status = get_pre_validation_status(output['pre_validation'])
                if pre_validation_status:
                    output['implementation'] = carry_out_implementation_activity_for_tabular_input(input_data_dict,output)
                    output['post_validation'] = carry_out_post_validation_activity_for_tabular_input(input_data_dict)                                
                    output['partial_rollback'] = generate_partial_rollback_commands(output['rollback'])
                    output['status'] = 'success'
                    output_util(output,None,)
                else:
                    log_util('Main - Prevalidation Failed ',True)
                    output['status'] = 'failed'
                    output_util(output,2 if input_dict_main['is_stop_workflow_on_failure'] else None)
            else:
                if input_dict_main['rollback_input'] == '' or input_dict_main['rollback_input'] == None:
                    log_util('Main - Rollback input is none',True)
                    raise Exception('Rollback input is none')
                else:
                    log_util('Main - Rollback Started ',True)
                    log_util('Main - rollback_input :'+str(input_dict_main['rollback_input']),False)
                    rollback_output = execute_rollback(input_dict_main['rollback_input'],False)
                    log_util('Main - rollback_output :'+str(rollback_output),True)
                    output['rollback_output'] = rollback_output
                    output['status'] = 'success'
                    output_util(output,None)            
    except Exception as exception:
        error_trace = traceback.format_exc()
        log_util('Main - error_trace :'+str(error_trace),True)
        log_util('Main - Exception received '+str(exception),True)
        output = {}
        output['status'] = 'failed'
        output['error'] = str(exception)
        if 'rollback' in output:
            execute_rollback(output['rollback'],True)        
        output_util(output,2 if input_dict_main['is_stop_workflow_on_failure'] else None)

tasks.description: This task is used to create / delete / modify the specified F5 Object. It can generate commands or execute the operation immediately

notificationMessage.0: Please Wait. F5 Task is in progress

tasks.scriptContent:
#------------------------------------------------------
# TASK DESCRIPTION 
#------------------------------------------------------
'''
Operation Type     : create / delete / modify 
Module         : ltm
Object         : pool




This OOB Task is to create / delete / modify the pool in the module ltm. ( Type of operation to be specified in 'operation_type' )

     - "is_deferred_execution" flag can be set to generate the commands or unset to execute immediately for carrying out the required operation with in the workflow.
     - "is_rollback" can be set along with 'rollback_input' to carryout the rollback operation. ( ' rollback ' of previous execution to be fed to ' rollback_input' ) 
     - "is_skip_required" flag can be set to skip the execution of this task in the work flow.
     - "is_stop_workflow_on_failure" flag can be set to stop the workflow execution in case of failure.
     - "tabular_input" ( list of json ) can be used for carrying out multiple object operations, with same input json format in a list.
     - Using the tabular input the actions can be mixed, like create and modify actions can be carried out in one go as well as the rollback of them 
     - Prevalidation and Postvalidation will be carried out before and after implementation
'''


#------------------------------------------------------
# INPUT DETAILS 
#------------------------------------------------------
'''
[
    { 'field_name' : 'operation_type',    'is_mandatory' : true,    'description' : 'Specify the operation to be carried out on the object ( create / modify / delete )' ,    'type' : 'string'},    
    { 'field_name' : 'device_name',    'is_mandatory' : true,    'description' : 'Device Name managed by AppViewX' ,    'type' : 'string','supported_operations':'create / modify / delete'},    
    { 'field_name' : 'is_rollback',    'is_mandatory' : false,    'description' : 'Flag to carryout the rollback' ,    'type' : 'json','supported_operations':'create / modify / delete'},    
    { 'field_name' : 'is_deferred_execution',    'is_mandatory' : false,    'description' : 'Flag to carryout the deferred execution' ,    'type' : 'string','supported_operations':'create / modify / delete'},    
    { 'field_name' : 'is_skip_required','is_mandatory' : false,    'description' : 'Set this flag to skip the task execution ( default False )' ,    'type' : 'bool','supported_operations':'create / modify / delete'},        
    { 'field_name' : 'is_stop_workflow_on_failure','is_mandatory' : false,    'description' : 'Set this flag to stop the workflow on failure of this task ( default False )' ,    'type' : 'bool','supported_operations':'create / modify / delete'},    
    { 'field_name' : 'rollback_input','is_mandatory' : false,    'description' : 'Input data for the rollback' ,    'type' : 'string','supported_operations':'create / modify / delete'},    
    { 'field_name' : 'tabular_input','is_mandatory' : false,    'description' : 'Input data for the rollback' ,    'type' : 'json','supported_operations':'create / modify / delete'},    

    { 'field_name' : 'name','is_mandatory' : true,    'description' : 'Name of the Object' ,    'type' : 'string','supported_operations':'create / modify / delete'},    
    { 'field_name' : 'enabled','is_mandatory' : false,    'description' : 'Set this flag to enable the object' ,    'type' : 'bool','supported_operations':'create / modify '},    
    { 'field_name' : 'all', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies that you want to modify all of the existing components of the specified type.', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'allow-nat', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies whether the pool can load balance network address translation (NAT) connections. The default value is ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'allow-snat', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies whether the pool can load balance secure network address translation (SNAT) connections. The default value is ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'app-service', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies the name of the application service to which the pool member belongs. The default value is ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'autoscale-group-id', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Deprecated since v13.1.0. Specifies the autoscale-group id as reported by Amazon Web Services(AWS).', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'description', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'User defined description.', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'gateway-failsafe-device', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies that the pool is a gateway failsafe pool in a redundant configuration. The gateway-failsafe-device identifies the device that depends on the gateway. If the monitor associated with the pool reports that the gateway is down, the device goes to the standby state. The default value for this string is empty, the feature is not configured.', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'ignore-persisted-weight', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Discounts the weight of connections made to pool members selected through persistence, rather than as a result of the algorithm configured on the pool. If the connection's weight is ignored, then it is not treated as a 'pick' for that pool member, and does not influence subsequent pool member load balancing decisions.', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},

The default value is ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'ip-tos-to-server', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies the ToS level to use when sending packets to a server. The default value is ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'link-qos-to-client', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies the Link Quality of Service (QoS) level to use when sending packets to a client. The default value is ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'link-qos-to-server', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies the Link QoS level to use when sending packets to a server. The default value is ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'load-balancing-mode', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies the modes that the system uses to load balance name resolution requests among the members of this pool. The default value is ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'members', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Adds, deletes, or replaces a set of pool members, by specifying a node name and service port in the format ', 'type' : 'json / string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'metadata', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Associates user-defined data, each of which has name and value pair and persistence. The default value is ', 'type' : 'json', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'min-active-members', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies the minimum number of members that must be ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'min-up-members', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies the minimum number of pool members that must be ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'min-up-members-action', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies the action to take if ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'min-up-members-checking', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Enables or disables the ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'monitor', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies the health monitors that the system uses to determine whether it can use this pool for load balancing. The monitor marks the pool ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'profiles', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies the profile to use for encapsulation. The default value is ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'queue-on-connection-limit', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Enable or disable queuing connections when pool member or node connection limits are reached. When queuing is not enabled, new connections are reset when connection limits are met. The default value is disabled.', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'queue-depth-limit', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies the maximum number of connections that may simultaneously be queued to go to any member of this pool. The default is zero which indicates there is no limit.', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'queue-time-limit', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies the maximum time, in milliseconds, a connection will remain enqueued. The default is zero which indicates there is no limit.', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'reselect-tries', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'When set to the default value of ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'service-down-action', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies the action to take if the service specified in the pool is marked ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'slow-ramp-time', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies, in seconds, the ramp time for the pool. This provides the ability to cause a pool member that has just been ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
]
'''

        AVX::OUTPUT(input,status)

def log_util(input_str,is_studio_log):
    if IS_DETAILED_LOG_IN_FILE:
        logger.info(input_str)
    if is_studio_log:
        AVX::LOG(input_str)

# action - task action like create / delete / modify
# activity - pre_validation, implementation, post_validation, rollback
def carry_out_action_wise_object_activity(activity,input_dict):
    log_util('carry_out_action_wise_object_activity - carry_out_action_wise_object_activity - input_dict :'+str(input_dict),False)

    operation_type = input_dict['operation_type']
    response = command_repo_connector.command_repo_connector(session_id,device_response_error_check[operation_type][activity]['indent'],input_dict['is_deferred_execution'],{k:v for k,v in input_dict.items() if v is not None})
    if input_dict['is_deferred_execution']:
        return response
    elif ( device_response_error_check[operation_type][activity]['availability'] and any(error in str(response['data']) for error in device_response_error_check[operation_type][activity]['list_of_messages']) ) or ( ( not device_response_error_check[operation_type][activity]['availability'] ) and ( not any(error in str(response['data']) for error in device_response_error_check[operation_type][activity]['list_of_messages']))):
        return response
    else:
        raise Exception('Error :' + input_dict['name'] + str(response['data']))

#Method to handle partial rollback
def partial_rollback(input_dict):
    operation_type = input_dict['operation_type']
    return command_repo_connector.command_repo_connector(session_id,device_response_error_check[operation_type]['rollback']['indent'],True,{k:v for k,v in input_dict.items() if v is not None})

def get_config_from_device(input_dict,is_deferred_execution):
    return command_repo_connector.command_repo_connector(session_id,command_repo_indent_list,is_deferred_execution,{k:v for k,v in input_dict.items() if v is not None})

def get_config_for_all_properties_from_device(input_dict,is_deferred_execution):
    payload = {k:v for k,v in input_dict.items() if v is not None}
    payload['all_properties'] = True
    return command_repo_connector.command_repo_connector(session_id,command_repo_indent_list,is_deferred_execution,payload)

def get_non_none_and_generic(input):
    input_with_non_none = {k:v for k,v in input.items() if ( (v is not None ) and ( v is not ''))}
    for key in generic_keys_for_the_task:        
        if key in input_with_non_none:
            del input_with_non_none[key]
    return input_with_non_none

#Method to handle rollback
def execute_rollback(rollback_input,is_skip_deferred):
    output = []        
    for rollback_dict in rollback_input:
        log_util('execute_rollback - Executing rollback for the input :'+str(rollback_dict),False)
        input_dict = rollback_dict['input_dict']
        device_name = input_dict['device_name']
        input_dict['is_deferred_execution'] = input_dict['is_deferred_execution'] if 'is_deferred_execution' in input_dict else None
        if is_skip_deferred and  input_dict['is_deferred_execution']:
            continue
        operation_type = input_dict['operation_type']
        current_output_dict = {}
        current_output_dict['device_name'] = input_dict['device_name']
        current_output_dict['operation_type'] = input_dict['operation_type']
        modify_dict_with_out_none_and_generic_fields = get_non_none_and_generic(input_dict)
        if input_dict['operation_type'] == 'create':
            response = command_repo_connector.command_repo_connector(session_id,device_response_error_check[operation_type]['rollback']['indent'],input_dict['is_deferred_execution'],{k:v for k,v in input_dict.items() if v is not None})
        elif input_dict['operation_type'] == 'modify':
            command_from_util = diff_util_modify_delete_rollback.get_modification_rollback_command(rollback_dict['config_before_modification_all_properties'],rollback_dict['config_before_modification'],modify_dict_with_out_none_and_generic_fields.keys(),list_of_fields_with_replace_all_with_properties,list_of_fields_to_be_ignored_during_rollback,list_of_fields_to_be_considered_during_rollback)
            command_from_util = 'modify '+module+' ' + object_type + get_record_type_command(input_dict) + input_dict['name']+' {'+command_from_util+' }'
            if input_dict['is_bash_shell']:
                command_from_util = 'tmsh '+command_from_util
            form_fields_command_repo = {'device_name':device_name,'command':command_from_util}
            if input_dict['is_deferred_execution']:
                response = {'commands':[command_from_util],'data':[]}
            else:
                response = command_repo_connector.command_repo_connector(session_id,device_response_error_check[operation_type]['rollback']['indent'],input_dict['is_deferred_execution'],form_fields_command_repo)
        elif input_dict['operation_type'] == 'delete':
            command_from_util = diff_util_modify_delete_rollback.get_delete_rollback_command(rollback_dict['config_before_modification'],list_of_fields_with_replace_all_with_properties,list_of_fields_to_be_ignored_during_rollback)
            command_from_util = 'create '+module+' ' + object_type + get_record_type_command(input_dict) + input_dict['name'] +' {'+command_from_util+' }'
            if input_dict['is_bash_shell']:
                command_from_util = 'tmsh '+command_from_util
            form_fields_command_repo = {'device_name':device_name,'command':command_from_util}
            if input_dict['is_deferred_execution']:
                response = {'commands':[command_from_util],'data':[]}
            else:
                response = command_repo_connector.command_repo_connector(session_id,device_response_error_check[operation_type]['rollback']['indent'],input_dict['is_deferred_execution'],form_fields_command_repo)

        current_output_dict['commands'] = response['commands'] if len(response['commands']) > 0 and input_dict['is_deferred_execution'] else []
        current_output_dict['data'] = response['data'] if len(response['data']) > 0 else []
        log_util('execute_rollback - Current Rollback output :'+str(current_output_dict),False)    
        output.append(current_output_dict)
    log_util('execute_rollback - Rollback Finished ',True)
    return output

def get_record_type_command(input):
    if 'record_type' in input:
        return ' '+input['record_type'] if ( input['record_type'] != None and input['record_type'] != '' ) else ' '
    else:
        return ' '

def carry_out_implementation_activity_for_tabular_input(tabular_input,output):
    log_util('carry_out_implementation_activity_for_tabular_input - Started Implementation',True)
    activity_output = []
    i = 0
    for input_dict in tabular_input:
        log_util('carry_out_implementation_activity_for_tabular_input - Processing input_dict - Operation Type : '+str(input_dict['operation_type']),True)
        log_util('carry_out_implementation_activity_for_tabular_input - input_dict :'+str(input_dict),True)

        rollback_for_current_input_dict = {}        
        rollback_for_current_input_dict['input_dict'] = input_dict
        rollback_for_current_input_dict['config_before_modification'] = output['pre_validation'][i]['data'][0]
        i = i+1

        config_for_all_properties = get_config_for_all_properties_from_device(input_dict,False)['data'][0]
        log_util('carry_out_implementation_activity_for_tabular_input - config_for_all_properties :'+str(config_for_all_properties),False)
        
        #Removing unwanted content from list all-properties
        if module+' ' + object_type + get_record_type_command(input_dict) + input_dict['name'] in config_for_all_properties:
            config_for_all_properties = config_for_all_properties[config_for_all_properties.index(module+' '+object_type+get_record_type_command(input_dict)+input_dict['name']):]

        rollback_for_current_input_dict['config_before_modification_all_properties'] = config_for_all_properties

        output_from_command_repo = carry_out_action_wise_object_activity('implementation',input_dict)
        log_util('carry_out_implementation_activity_for_tabular_input - output_from_command_repo'+str(output_from_command_repo),True)
        if(not input_dict['is_deferred_execution']):
            config = get_config_from_device(input_dict,input_dict['is_deferred_execution'])
            rollback_for_current_input_dict['config_after_modification'] = config['data'][0]

        output_dict = {}
        output_dict['device_name'] = input_dict['device_name']
        output_dict['data'] = output_from_command_repo['data']
        output_dict['commands'] = output_from_command_repo['commands'] if input_dict['is_deferred_execution'] else []
        output_dict['operation_type'] = input_dict['operation_type']
        log_util('carry_out_implementation_activity_for_tabular_input - Implementation Output Dict :'+str(output_dict),False)
        log_util('carry_out_implementation_activity_for_tabular_input - rollback_for_current_input_dict :'+str(rollback_for_current_input_dict),False)

        activity_output.append(output_dict)

        output['rollback'].append(rollback_for_current_input_dict)
        output['object_names'].append(input_dict['name'])

    log_util('carry_out_implementation_activity_for_tabular_input - Finished Implementation',True)
    return activity_output

def carry_out_pre_validation_activity_for_tabular_input(tabular_input):
    log_util('carry_out_pre_validation_activity_for_tabular_input - Carrying out pre_validation',True)
    activity_output = []
    for input_dict in tabular_input:
        config_data = get_config_from_device(input_dict,False)
        output_dict = {}
        output_dict['device_name'] = input_dict['device_name']
        output_dict['data'] = config_data['data']
        output_dict['commands'] = config_data['commands'] if input_dict['is_deferred_execution'] else []
        output_dict['operation_type'] = input_dict['operation_type']
        activity_output.append(output_dict)
        log_util('carry_out_pre_validation_activity_for_tabular_input - Validation Output :'+str(output_dict),False)
    log_util('carry_out_pre_validation_activity_for_tabular_input - Finished pre_validation',True)
    return activity_output

def carry_out_post_validation_activity_for_tabular_input(tabular_input):
    log_util('carry_out_post_validation_activity_for_tabular_input - Carrying out post_validation',True)
    activity_output = []
    for input_dict in tabular_input:
        config_data = get_config_from_device(input_dict,input_dict['is_deferred_execution'])
        output_dict = {}
        output_dict['device_name'] = input_dict['device_name']
        output_dict['data'] = config_data['data']
        output_dict['commands'] = config_data['commands'] if input_dict['is_deferred_execution'] else []
        output_dict['operation_type'] = input_dict['operation_type']
        activity_output.append(output_dict)
        log_util('carry_out_post_validation_activity_for_tabular_input - Validation Output :'+str(output_dict),False)
    log_util('carry_out_post_validation_activity_for_tabular_input - Finished post_validation',True)
    return activity_output

def generate_partial_rollback_commands(rollback_input):
    log_util('generate_partial_rollback_commands - Started generation of partial rollback commands',True)
    output = []        
    for rollback_dict in rollback_input:
        log_util('generate_partial_rollback_commands_from_rollback - Generating Partial Rollback Command :'+str(rollback_dict),False)
        input_dict = rollback_dict['input_dict']
        device_name = input_dict['device_name']
        operation_type = input_dict['operation_type']

        current_output_dict = {}
        current_output_dict['device_name'] = input_dict['device_name']
        current_output_dict['operation_type'] = input_dict['operation_type']
        modify_dict_with_out_none_and_generic_fields = get_non_none_and_generic(input_dict)
        if input_dict['operation_type'] == 'create':
            response = command_repo_connector.command_repo_connector(session_id,device_response_error_check[operation_type]['rollback']['indent'],True,{k:v for k,v in input_dict.items() if v is not None})
            current_output_dict['commands'] = response['commands'] if len(response['commands']) > 0 else []
            current_output_dict['data'] = response['data'] if len(response['data']) > 0 else []

        elif input_dict['operation_type'] == 'modify':
            command_from_util = diff_util_modify_delete_rollback.get_modification_rollback_command(rollback_dict['config_before_modification_all_properties'],rollback_dict['config_before_modification'],modify_dict_with_out_none_and_generic_fields.keys(),list_of_fields_with_replace_all_with_properties,list_of_fields_to_be_ignored_during_rollback,list_of_fields_to_be_considered_during_rollback)
            command_from_util = 'modify '+module+' ' + object_type + ' ' +get_record_type_command(input_dict) + ' ' +input_dict['name']+' {'+command_from_util+' }'
            if input_dict['is_bash_shell']:
                command_from_util = 'tmsh '+command_from_util
                
            current_output_dict['commands'] = [command_from_util]
            current_output_dict['data'] = []
            

        elif input_dict['operation_type'] == 'delete':
            command_from_util = diff_util_modify_delete_rollback.get_delete_rollback_command(rollback_dict['config_before_modification'],list_of_fields_with_replace_all_with_properties,list_of_fields_to_be_ignored_during_rollback)
            command_from_util = 'create '+module+' ' + object_type + ' ' +get_record_type_command(input_dict) + ' ' +input_dict['name']+' {'+command_from_util+' }'            
            if input_dict['is_bash_shell']:
                command_from_util = 'tmsh '+command_from_util

            current_output_dict['commands'] = [command_from_util]
            current_output_dict['data'] = []
        
        log_util('execute_rollback - Current Rollback output :'+str(current_output_dict),False)    
        output.append(current_output_dict)
    log_util('execute_rollback - Rollback Finished ',True)
    return output

def set_skip_message(output):
    output['status'] = 'skipped'
    output['message'] = 'task execution skipped'
    output_util(output,None)

def get_pre_validation_status(list_of_pre_validation_input):
    log_util('get_pre_validation_status - Started pre_validation status',True)
    pre_validation_status = True

    for pre_validation_input in list_of_pre_validation_input:
        log_util('get_pre_validation_status - Processing pre_validation_input :'+str(pre_validation_input),False)
        operation_type = pre_validation_input['operation_type']
        current_status =  ( device_response_error_check[operation_type]['pre_validation']['availability'] and any(error in str(pre_validation_input['data']) for error in device_response_error_check[operation_type]['pre_validation']['list_of_messages']) ) or ( ( not device_response_error_check[operation_type]['pre_validation']['availability'] ) and ( not any(error in str(pre_validation_input['data']) for error in device_response_error_check[operation_type]['pre_validation']['list_of_messages'])))
        pre_validation_status = pre_validation_status and current_status        
        log_util('get_pre_validation_status - pre_validation_status :'+str(pre_validation_status),True)

        if not pre_validation_status:
            log_util('get_pre_validation_status - Pre validation failed in Data :'+str(pre_validation_input['data'])+' Command :'+str(pre_validation_input['commands'])+' Data : '+str(pre_validation_input),True)
            break;
    log_util('get_pre_validation_status - Finished pre_validation status',True)
    return pre_validation_status

def is_input_validation_success(input_data_dict):
    output = True
    log_util('Started validating user input ',True)
    for input_dict in input_data_dict:
        if ( 'enabled' in input_dict and 'disabled' in input_dict ) and ( ((True if input_dict['enabled'] else False) and (True if input_dict['disabled'] else False) ))  :
            output = False
            log_util('enable disable bot are set to true :'+str(input_dict),True)
    log_util('Completed validating user input ',True)
    return output

if __name__ == '__main__':
    log_util('Main - Started Task : ltm-pool',True)
    output = {}    
    #Rollback with sequence number in the forward flow of execution    
    input_dict_main = {}

    
    try:
        #Get the input from the global
        input_dict_main = generate_input()

        if input_dict_main['is_skip_required']:
            log_util('Main - Skipping the Task Execution',True)
            #To skip the task execution
            set_skip_message(output)
        else:
            #Handle tabular input
            input_data_dict = process_tabular_data(input_dict_main)

            input_validation_status = is_input_validation_success(input_data_dict)

            if not input_validation_status:
                log_util('User input validation failed',True)
                output['status'] = 'failed'
                output_util(output,2 if input_dict_main['is_stop_workflow_on_failure'] else None)
            elif not input_dict_main['is_rollback']:
                log_util('Main - Implementation Action :'+str(input_dict_main['operation_type'])+' started ',True)
                output['rollback'] = []
                output['object_names'] = []

                output['pre_validation'] = carry_out_pre_validation_activity_for_tabular_input(input_data_dict)
                pre_validation_status = get_pre_validation_status(output['pre_validation'])
                if pre_validation_status:
                    output['implementation'] = carry_out_implementation_activity_for_tabular_input(input_data_dict,output)
                    output['post_validation'] = carry_out_post_validation_activity_for_tabular_input(input_data_dict)                                
                    output['partial_rollback'] = generate_partial_rollback_commands(output['rollback'])
                    output['status'] = 'success'
                    output_util(output,None,)
                else:
                    log_util('Main - Prevalidation Failed ',True)
                    output['status'] = 'failed'
                    output_util(output,2 if input_dict_main['is_stop_workflow_on_failure'] else None)
            else:
                if input_dict_main['rollback_input'] == '' or input_dict_main['rollback_input'] == None:
                    log_util('Main - Rollback input is none',True)
                    raise Exception('Rollback input is none')
                else:
                    log_util('Main - Rollback Started ',True)
                    log_util('Main - rollback_input :'+str(input_dict_main['rollback_input']),False)
                    rollback_output = execute_rollback(input_dict_main['rollback_input'],False)
                    log_util('Main - rollback_output :'+str(rollback_output),True)
                    output['rollback_output'] = rollback_output
                    output['status'] = 'success'
                    output_util(output,None)            
    except Exception as exception:
        error_trace = traceback.format_exc()
        log_util('Main - error_trace :'+str(error_trace),True)
        log_util('Main - Exception received '+str(exception),True)
        output = {}
        output['status'] = 'failed'
        output['error'] = str(exception)
        if 'rollback' in output:
            execute_rollback(output['rollback'],True)        
        output_util(output,2 if input_dict_main['is_stop_workflow_on_failure'] else None)

tasks.scriptContent:
#------------------------------------------------------
# TASK DESCRIPTION 
#------------------------------------------------------
'''
Operation Type     : create / delete / modify 
Module         : ltm
Object         : monitor http




This OOB Task is to create / delete / modify the monitor http in the module ltm. ( Type of operation to be specified in 'operation_type' )

     - "is_deferred_execution" flag can be set to generate the commands or unset to execute immediately for carrying out the required operation with in the workflow.
     - "is_rollback" can be set along with 'rollback_input' to carryout the rollback operation. ( ' rollback ' of previous execution to be fed to ' rollback_input' ) 
     - "is_skip_required" flag can be set to skip the execution of this task in the work flow.
     - "is_stop_workflow_on_failure" flag can be set to stop the workflow execution in case of failure.
     - "tabular_input" ( list of json ) can be used for carrying out multiple object operations, with same input json format in a list.
     - Using the tabular input the actions can be mixed, like create and modify actions can be carried out in one go as well as the rollback of them 
     - Prevalidation and Postvalidation will be carried out before and after implementation
'''


#------------------------------------------------------
# INPUT DETAILS 
#------------------------------------------------------
'''
[

Not all monitors support the adaptive feature.', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},

For example, if this value is 500, then the probe latency may not exceed 500 ms even if that would still fall within the divergence value.', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},

For example, if this value is 300, then a sliding window of the last five minutes' probe history will be used for calculating probe mean latency and standard deviation.', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'app-service', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies the name of the application service to which the monitor belongs. The default value is ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},

The default value is ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},

The default value is ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},

When the monitor is in reverse mode, a successful check marks the monitored object ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},

DSCP is a 6-bit value in the Differentiated Services (DS) field of the IP header. It can be used to specify the quality of service desired for the packet. The valid range for this value is 0 to 63 (hex 0x0 to 0x3f). The default value is zero.', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},

The default value is ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},

Monitors in transparent mode can monitor pool members through firewalls.     { 'field_name' : 'username', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies the username, if the monitored target requires authentication. The default value is ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
]
