#Method to process tabular data
def process_tabular_data(input_dict_main):
    log_util('process_tabular_data - Started Processing tabular input',True)
    tabular_input = input_dict_main['tabular_input']
    list_input_data = []

    if tabular_input!=None and len(tabular_input)>0:
        for table_input_member in tabular_input:
            log_util('process_tabular_data - Input dict generation :'+str(table_input_member),True)
            input_dict = {}
            input_dict['all'] = table_input_member['all'] if 'all' in table_input_member else None
            input_dict['app-service'] = table_input_member['app-service'] if 'app-service' in table_input_member else None
            input_dict['defaults-from'] = table_input_member['defaults-from'] if 'defaults-from' in table_input_member else None
            input_dict['description'] = table_input_member['description'] if 'description' in table_input_member else None
            input_dict['has-session-dir'] = table_input_member['has-session-dir'] if 'has-session-dir' in table_input_member else None
            input_dict['match-across-pools'] = table_input_member['match-across-pools'] if 'match-across-pools' in table_input_member else None
            input_dict['match-across-services'] = table_input_member['match-across-services'] if 'match-across-services' in table_input_member else None
            input_dict['match-across-virtuals'] = table_input_member['match-across-virtuals'] if 'match-across-virtuals' in table_input_member else None
            input_dict['mirror'] = table_input_member['mirror'] if 'mirror' in table_input_member else None
            input_dict['override-connection-limit'] = table_input_member['override-connection-limit'] if 'override-connection-limit' in table_input_member else None
            input_dict['timeout'] = table_input_member['timeout'] if 'timeout' in table_input_member else None

            input_dict['device_name'] = table_input_member['device_name'] if 'device_name' in table_input_member else input_dict_main['device_name']
            input_dict['is_rollback'] = oob_task_utility.get_boolean_field(table_input_member['is_rollback'] if 'is_rollback' in table_input_member else input_dict_main['is_rollback'])
            input_dict['rollback_input'] = table_input_member['rollback_input'] if 'rollback_input' in table_input_member else input_dict_main['rollback_input']
            input_dict['is_deferred_execution'] = oob_task_utility.get_boolean_field(table_input_member['is_deferred_execution'] if 'is_deferred_execution' in table_input_member else input_dict_main['is_deferred_execution'])
            input_dict['name'] = table_input_member['name'] if 'name' in table_input_member else input_dict_main['name']
            input_dict['enabled'] = table_input_member['enabled'] if 'enabled' in table_input_member else None
            input_dict['operation_type'] = oob_task_utility.get_default_operation_type(table_input_member['operation_type'] if 'operation_type' in table_input_member else None)
            input_dict['is_bash_shell'] = tmsh_util.is_bash_shell(input_dict['device_name'],session_id)
            input_dict['module'] = 'ltm'
            input_dict['object_type'] = 'persistence msrdp'
            list_input_data.append(input_dict)
    else:
        list_input_data.append(input_dict_main)

    log_util('process_tabular_data - Input dict generated list :'+str(list_input_data),True)
    log_util('process_tabular_data - Completed Processing tabular input',True)
    return list_input_data

def output_util(input,status):
    log_util('Main - '+str(input),True)
    if status!=None:
        AVX::OUTPUT(input,status)
    else:
        AVX::OUTPUT(input)

def log_util(input_str,is_studio_log):
    if IS_DETAILED_LOG_IN_FILE:
        logger.info(input_str)
    if is_studio_log:
        AVX::LOG(input_str)

# action - task action like create / delete / modify
# activity - pre_validation, implementation, post_validation, rollback
def carry_out_action_wise_object_activity(activity,input_dict):
    log_util('carry_out_action_wise_object_activity - carry_out_action_wise_object_activity - input_dict :'+str(input_dict),False)

    operation_type = input_dict['operation_type']
    response = command_repo_connector.command_repo_connector(session_id,device_response_error_check[operation_type][activity]['indent'],input_dict['is_deferred_execution'],{k:v for k,v in input_dict.items() if v is not None})
    if input_dict['is_deferred_execution']:
        return response
    elif ( device_response_error_check[operation_type][activity]['availability'] and any(error in str(response['data']) for error in device_response_error_check[operation_type][activity]['list_of_messages']) ) or ( ( not device_response_error_check[operation_type][activity]['availability'] ) and ( not any(error in str(response['data']) for error in device_response_error_check[operation_type][activity]['list_of_messages']))):
        return response
    else:
        raise Exception('Error :' + input_dict['name'] + str(response['data']))

#Method to handle partial rollback
def partial_rollback(input_dict):
    operation_type = input_dict['operation_type']
    return command_repo_connector.command_repo_connector(session_id,device_response_error_check[operation_type]['rollback']['indent'],True,{k:v for k,v in input_dict.items() if v is not None})

def get_config_from_device(input_dict,is_deferred_execution):
    return command_repo_connector.command_repo_connector(session_id,command_repo_indent_list,is_deferred_execution,{k:v for k,v in input_dict.items() if v is not None})

def get_config_for_all_properties_from_device(input_dict,is_deferred_execution):
    payload = {k:v for k,v in input_dict.items() if v is not None}
    payload['all_properties'] = True
    return command_repo_connector.command_repo_connector(session_id,command_repo_indent_list,is_deferred_execution,payload)

def get_non_none_and_generic(input):
    input_with_non_none = {k:v for k,v in input.items() if ( (v is not None ) and ( v is not ''))}
    for key in generic_keys_for_the_task:        
        if key in input_with_non_none:
            del input_with_non_none[key]
    return input_with_non_none

#Method to handle rollback
def execute_rollback(rollback_input,is_skip_deferred):
    output = []        
    for rollback_dict in rollback_input:
        log_util('execute_rollback - Executing rollback for the input :'+str(rollback_dict),False)
        input_dict = rollback_dict['input_dict']
        device_name = input_dict['device_name']
        input_dict['is_deferred_execution'] = input_dict['is_deferred_execution'] if 'is_deferred_execution' in input_dict else None
        if is_skip_deferred and  input_dict['is_deferred_execution']:
            continue
        operation_type = input_dict['operation_type']
        current_output_dict = {}
        current_output_dict['device_name'] = input_dict['device_name']
        current_output_dict['operation_type'] = input_dict['operation_type']
        modify_dict_with_out_none_and_generic_fields = get_non_none_and_generic(input_dict)
        if input_dict['operation_type'] == 'create':
            response = command_repo_connector.command_repo_connector(session_id,device_response_error_check[operation_type]['rollback']['indent'],input_dict['is_deferred_execution'],{k:v for k,v in input_dict.items() if v is not None})
        elif input_dict['operation_type'] == 'modify':
            command_from_util = diff_util_modify_delete_rollback.get_modification_rollback_command(rollback_dict['config_before_modification_all_properties'],rollback_dict['config_before_modification'],modify_dict_with_out_none_and_generic_fields.keys(),list_of_fields_with_replace_all_with_properties,list_of_fields_to_be_ignored_during_rollback,list_of_fields_to_be_considered_during_rollback)
            command_from_util = 'modify '+module+' ' + object_type + get_record_type_command(input_dict) + input_dict['name']+' {'+command_from_util+' }'
            if input_dict['is_bash_shell']:
                command_from_util = 'tmsh '+command_from_util
            form_fields_command_repo = {'device_name':device_name,'command':command_from_util}
            if input_dict['is_deferred_execution']:
                response = {'commands':[command_from_util],'data':[]}
            else:
                response = command_repo_connector.command_repo_connector(session_id,device_response_error_check[operation_type]['rollback']['indent'],input_dict['is_deferred_execution'],form_fields_command_repo)
        elif input_dict['operation_type'] == 'delete':
            command_from_util = diff_util_modify_delete_rollback.get_delete_rollback_command(rollback_dict['config_before_modification'],list_of_fields_with_replace_all_with_properties,list_of_fields_to_be_ignored_during_rollback)
            command_from_util = 'create '+module+' ' + object_type + get_record_type_command(input_dict) + input_dict['name'] +' {'+command_from_util+' }'
            if input_dict['is_bash_shell']:
                command_from_util = 'tmsh '+command_from_util
            form_fields_command_repo = {'device_name':device_name,'command':command_from_util}
            if input_dict['is_deferred_execution']:
                response = {'commands':[command_from_util],'data':[]}
            else:
                response = command_repo_connector.command_repo_connector(session_id,device_response_error_check[operation_type]['rollback']['indent'],input_dict['is_deferred_execution'],form_fields_command_repo)

        current_output_dict['commands'] = response['commands'] if len(response['commands']) > 0 and input_dict['is_deferred_execution'] else []
        current_output_dict['data'] = response['data'] if len(response['data']) > 0 else []
        log_util('execute_rollback - Current Rollback output :'+str(current_output_dict),False)    
        output.append(current_output_dict)
    log_util('execute_rollback - Rollback Finished ',True)
    return output

def get_record_type_command(input):
    if 'record_type' in input:
        return ' '+input['record_type'] if ( input['record_type'] != None and input['record_type'] != '' ) else ' '
    else:
        return ' '

def carry_out_implementation_activity_for_tabular_input(tabular_input,output):
    log_util('carry_out_implementation_activity_for_tabular_input - Started Implementation',True)
    activity_output = []
    i = 0
    for input_dict in tabular_input:
        log_util('carry_out_implementation_activity_for_tabular_input - Processing input_dict - Operation Type : '+str(input_dict['operation_type']),True)
        log_util('carry_out_implementation_activity_for_tabular_input - input_dict :'+str(input_dict),True)

        rollback_for_current_input_dict = {}        
        rollback_for_current_input_dict['input_dict'] = input_dict
        rollback_for_current_input_dict['config_before_modification'] = output['pre_validation'][i]['data'][0]
        i = i+1

        config_for_all_properties = get_config_for_all_properties_from_device(input_dict,False)['data'][0]
        log_util('carry_out_implementation_activity_for_tabular_input - config_for_all_properties :'+str(config_for_all_properties),False)
        
        #Removing unwanted content from list all-properties
        if module+' ' + object_type + get_record_type_command(input_dict) + input_dict['name'] in config_for_all_properties:
            config_for_all_properties = config_for_all_properties[config_for_all_properties.index(module+' '+object_type+get_record_type_command(input_dict)+input_dict['name']):]

        rollback_for_current_input_dict['config_before_modification_all_properties'] = config_for_all_properties

        output_from_command_repo = carry_out_action_wise_object_activity('implementation',input_dict)
        log_util('carry_out_implementation_activity_for_tabular_input - output_from_command_repo'+str(output_from_command_repo),True)
        if(not input_dict['is_deferred_execution']):
            config = get_config_from_device(input_dict,input_dict['is_deferred_execution'])
            rollback_for_current_input_dict['config_after_modification'] = config['data'][0]

        output_dict = {}
        output_dict['device_name'] = input_dict['device_name']
        output_dict['data'] = output_from_command_repo['data']
        output_dict['commands'] = output_from_command_repo['commands'] if input_dict['is_deferred_execution'] else []
        output_dict['operation_type'] = input_dict['operation_type']
        log_util('carry_out_implementation_activity_for_tabular_input - Implementation Output Dict :'+str(output_dict),False)
        log_util('carry_out_implementation_activity_for_tabular_input - rollback_for_current_input_dict :'+str(rollback_for_current_input_dict),False)

        activity_output.append(output_dict)

        output['rollback'].append(rollback_for_current_input_dict)
        output['object_names'].append(input_dict['name'])

    log_util('carry_out_implementation_activity_for_tabular_input - Finished Implementation',True)
    return activity_output

def carry_out_pre_validation_activity_for_tabular_input(tabular_input):
    log_util('carry_out_pre_validation_activity_for_tabular_input - Carrying out pre_validation',True)
    activity_output = []
    for input_dict in tabular_input:
        config_data = get_config_from_device(input_dict,False)
        output_dict = {}
        output_dict['device_name'] = input_dict['device_name']
        output_dict['data'] = config_data['data']
        output_dict['commands'] = config_data['commands'] if input_dict['is_deferred_execution'] else []
        output_dict['operation_type'] = input_dict['operation_type']
        activity_output.append(output_dict)
        log_util('carry_out_pre_validation_activity_for_tabular_input - Validation Output :'+str(output_dict),False)
    log_util('carry_out_pre_validation_activity_for_tabular_input - Finished pre_validation',True)
    return activity_output

def carry_out_post_validation_activity_for_tabular_input(tabular_input):
    log_util('carry_out_post_validation_activity_for_tabular_input - Carrying out post_validation',True)
    activity_output = []
    for input_dict in tabular_input:
        config_data = get_config_from_device(input_dict,input_dict['is_deferred_execution'])
        output_dict = {}
        output_dict['device_name'] = input_dict['device_name']
        output_dict['data'] = config_data['data']
        output_dict['commands'] = config_data['commands'] if input_dict['is_deferred_execution'] else []
        output_dict['operation_type'] = input_dict['operation_type']
        activity_output.append(output_dict)
        log_util('carry_out_post_validation_activity_for_tabular_input - Validation Output :'+str(output_dict),False)
    log_util('carry_out_post_validation_activity_for_tabular_input - Finished post_validation',True)
    return activity_output

def generate_partial_rollback_commands(rollback_input):
    log_util('generate_partial_rollback_commands - Started generation of partial rollback commands',True)
    output = []        
    for rollback_dict in rollback_input:
        log_util('generate_partial_rollback_commands_from_rollback - Generating Partial Rollback Command :'+str(rollback_dict),False)
        input_dict = rollback_dict['input_dict']
        device_name = input_dict['device_name']
        operation_type = input_dict['operation_type']

        current_output_dict = {}
        current_output_dict['device_name'] = input_dict['device_name']
        current_output_dict['operation_type'] = input_dict['operation_type']
        modify_dict_with_out_none_and_generic_fields = get_non_none_and_generic(input_dict)
        if input_dict['operation_type'] == 'create':
            response = command_repo_connector.command_repo_connector(session_id,device_response_error_check[operation_type]['rollback']['indent'],True,{k:v for k,v in input_dict.items() if v is not None})
            current_output_dict['commands'] = response['commands'] if len(response['commands']) > 0 else []
            current_output_dict['data'] = response['data'] if len(response['data']) > 0 else []

        elif input_dict['operation_type'] == 'modify':
            command_from_util = diff_util_modify_delete_rollback.get_modification_rollback_command(rollback_dict['config_before_modification_all_properties'],rollback_dict['config_before_modification'],modify_dict_with_out_none_and_generic_fields.keys(),list_of_fields_with_replace_all_with_properties,list_of_fields_to_be_ignored_during_rollback,list_of_fields_to_be_considered_during_rollback)
            command_from_util = 'modify '+module+' ' + object_type + ' ' +get_record_type_command(input_dict) + ' ' +input_dict['name']+' {'+command_from_util+' }'
            if input_dict['is_bash_shell']:
                command_from_util = 'tmsh '+command_from_util
                
            current_output_dict['commands'] = [command_from_util]
            current_output_dict['data'] = []
            

        elif input_dict['operation_type'] == 'delete':
            command_from_util = diff_util_modify_delete_rollback.get_delete_rollback_command(rollback_dict['config_before_modification'],list_of_fields_with_replace_all_with_properties,list_of_fields_to_be_ignored_during_rollback)
            command_from_util = 'create '+module+' ' + object_type + ' ' +get_record_type_command(input_dict) + ' ' +input_dict['name']+' {'+command_from_util+' }'            
            if input_dict['is_bash_shell']:
                command_from_util = 'tmsh '+command_from_util

            current_output_dict['commands'] = [command_from_util]
            current_output_dict['data'] = []
        
        log_util('execute_rollback - Current Rollback output :'+str(current_output_dict),False)    
        output.append(current_output_dict)
    log_util('execute_rollback - Rollback Finished ',True)
    return output

def set_skip_message(output):
    output['status'] = 'skipped'
    output['message'] = 'task execution skipped'
    output_util(output,None)

def get_pre_validation_status(list_of_pre_validation_input):
    log_util('get_pre_validation_status - Started pre_validation status',True)
    pre_validation_status = True

    for pre_validation_input in list_of_pre_validation_input:
        log_util('get_pre_validation_status - Processing pre_validation_input :'+str(pre_validation_input),False)
        operation_type = pre_validation_input['operation_type']
        current_status =  ( device_response_error_check[operation_type]['pre_validation']['availability'] and any(error in str(pre_validation_input['data']) for error in device_response_error_check[operation_type]['pre_validation']['list_of_messages']) ) or ( ( not device_response_error_check[operation_type]['pre_validation']['availability'] ) and ( not any(error in str(pre_validation_input['data']) for error in device_response_error_check[operation_type]['pre_validation']['list_of_messages'])))
        pre_validation_status = pre_validation_status and current_status        
        log_util('get_pre_validation_status - pre_validation_status :'+str(pre_validation_status),True)

        if not pre_validation_status:
            log_util('get_pre_validation_status - Pre validation failed in Data :'+str(pre_validation_input['data'])+' Command :'+str(pre_validation_input['commands'])+' Data : '+str(pre_validation_input),True)
            break;
    log_util('get_pre_validation_status - Finished pre_validation status',True)
    return pre_validation_status

def is_input_validation_success(input_data_dict):
    output = True
    log_util('Started validating user input ',True)
    for input_dict in input_data_dict:
        if ( 'enabled' in input_dict and 'disabled' in input_dict ) and ( ((True if input_dict['enabled'] else False) and (True if input_dict['disabled'] else False) ))  :
            output = False
            log_util('enable disable bot are set to true :'+str(input_dict),True)
    log_util('Completed validating user input ',True)
    return output

if __name__ == '__main__':
    log_util('Main - Started Task : ltm-persistence msrdp',True)
    output = {}    
    #Rollback with sequence number in the forward flow of execution    
    input_dict_main = {}

    
    try:
        #Get the input from the global
        input_dict_main = generate_input()

        if input_dict_main['is_skip_required']:
            log_util('Main - Skipping the Task Execution',True)
            #To skip the task execution
            set_skip_message(output)
        else:
            #Handle tabular input
            input_data_dict = process_tabular_data(input_dict_main)

            input_validation_status = is_input_validation_success(input_data_dict)

            if not input_validation_status:
                log_util('User input validation failed',True)
                output['status'] = 'failed'
                output_util(output,2 if input_dict_main['is_stop_workflow_on_failure'] else None)
            elif not input_dict_main['is_rollback']:
                log_util('Main - Implementation Action :'+str(input_dict_main['operation_type'])+' started ',True)
                output['rollback'] = []
                output['object_names'] = []

                output['pre_validation'] = carry_out_pre_validation_activity_for_tabular_input(input_data_dict)
                pre_validation_status = get_pre_validation_status(output['pre_validation'])
                if pre_validation_status:
                    output['implementation'] = carry_out_implementation_activity_for_tabular_input(input_data_dict,output)
                    output['post_validation'] = carry_out_post_validation_activity_for_tabular_input(input_data_dict)                                
                    output['partial_rollback'] = generate_partial_rollback_commands(output['rollback'])
                    output['status'] = 'success'
                    output_util(output,None,)
                else:
                    log_util('Main - Prevalidation Failed ',True)
                    output['status'] = 'failed'
                    output_util(output,2 if input_dict_main['is_stop_workflow_on_failure'] else None)
            else:
                if input_dict_main['rollback_input'] == '' or input_dict_main['rollback_input'] == None:
                    log_util('Main - Rollback input is none',True)
                    raise Exception('Rollback input is none')
                else:
                    log_util('Main - Rollback Started ',True)
                    log_util('Main - rollback_input :'+str(input_dict_main['rollback_input']),False)
                    rollback_output = execute_rollback(input_dict_main['rollback_input'],False)
                    log_util('Main - rollback_output :'+str(rollback_output),True)
                    output['rollback_output'] = rollback_output
                    output['status'] = 'success'
                    output_util(output,None)            
    except Exception as exception:
        error_trace = traceback.format_exc()
        log_util('Main - error_trace :'+str(error_trace),True)
        log_util('Main - Exception received '+str(exception),True)
        output = {}
        output['status'] = 'failed'
        output['error'] = str(exception)
        if 'rollback' in output:
            execute_rollback(output['rollback'],True)        
        output_util(output,2 if input_dict_main['is_stop_workflow_on_failure'] else None)

tasks.description: This task is used to create / delete / modify the specified DNS Infoblox record. It can generate rest for api or execute the operation immediately
tasks.scriptContent:
#------------------------------------------------------
# TASK DESCRIPTION 
#------------------------------------------------------
'''
Operation Type     : create / delete / modify 
Module         : ltm
Object         : persistence sip




This OOB Task is to create / delete / modify the persistence sip in the module ltm. ( Type of operation to be specified in 'operation_type' )

     - "is_deferred_execution" flag can be set to generate the commands or unset to execute immediately for carrying out the required operation with in the workflow.
     - "is_rollback" can be set along with 'rollback_input' to carryout the rollback operation. ( ' rollback ' of previous execution to be fed to ' rollback_input' ) 
     - "is_skip_required" flag can be set to skip the execution of this task in the work flow.
     - "is_stop_workflow_on_failure" flag can be set to stop the workflow execution in case of failure.
     - "tabular_input" ( list of json ) can be used for carrying out multiple object operations, with same input json format in a list.
     - Using the tabular input the actions can be mixed, like create and modify actions can be carried out in one go as well as the rollback of them 
     - Prevalidation and Postvalidation will be carried out before and after implementation
'''


#------------------------------------------------------
# INPUT DETAILS 
#------------------------------------------------------
'''
[
    { 'field_name' : 'operation_type',    'is_mandatory' : true,    'description' : 'Specify the operation to be carried out on the object ( create / modify / delete )' ,    'type' : 'string'},    
    { 'field_name' : 'device_name',    'is_mandatory' : true,    'description' : 'Device Name managed by AppViewX' ,    'type' : 'string','supported_operations':'create / modify / delete'},    
    { 'field_name' : 'is_rollback',    'is_mandatory' : false,    'description' : 'Flag to carryout the rollback' ,    'type' : 'json','supported_operations':'create / modify / delete'},    
    { 'field_name' : 'is_deferred_execution',    'is_mandatory' : false,    'description' : 'Flag to carryout the deferred execution' ,    'type' : 'string','supported_operations':'create / modify / delete'},    
    { 'field_name' : 'is_skip_required','is_mandatory' : false,    'description' : 'Set this flag to skip the task execution ( default False )' ,    'type' : 'bool','supported_operations':'create / modify / delete'},        
    { 'field_name' : 'is_stop_workflow_on_failure','is_mandatory' : false,    'description' : 'Set this flag to stop the workflow on failure of this task ( default False )' ,    'type' : 'bool','supported_operations':'create / modify / delete'},    
    { 'field_name' : 'rollback_input','is_mandatory' : false,    'description' : 'Input data for the rollback' ,    'type' : 'string','supported_operations':'create / modify / delete'},    
    { 'field_name' : 'tabular_input','is_mandatory' : false,    'description' : 'Input data for the rollback' ,    'type' : 'json','supported_operations':'create / modify / delete'},    

    { 'field_name' : 'name','is_mandatory' : true,    'description' : 'Name of the Object' ,    'type' : 'string','supported_operations':'create / modify / delete'},    
    { 'field_name' : 'enabled','is_mandatory' : false,    'description' : 'Set this flag to enable the object' ,    'type' : 'bool','supported_operations':'create / modify '},    
    { 'field_name' : 'all', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : '', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'app-service', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies the name of the application service to which the profile belongs. The default value is ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'defaults-from', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies the existing profile from which the system imports settings for the new profile. The default value is ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'description', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'User defined description.', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'match-across-pools', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies, when ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'match-across-services', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies, when ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'match-across-virtuals', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies, when ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'mirror', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies whether the system mirrors persistence records to the high-availability peer. The default value is ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'override-connection-limit', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies, when ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'sip-info', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies the SIP header field on which you want SIP sessions to persist. The default value is ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'timeout', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies the duration of the persistence entries. The default value is ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
]
'''


#------------------------------------------------------
# SAMPLE INPUT 
#------------------------------------------------------
'''
{
    "operation_type"  :  "create",
    "device_name"  :  "Test_Device",
    "is_rollback"  :  "false",
    "is_deferred_execution"  :  "true",
    "is_skip_required" :"true",
    "is_stop_workflow_on_failure":"true",
    "rollback_input"  :  [],
    "tabular_input"  :  [{"name":"test_object_010" ... }],
    "name"  :  "test_object_001",
    "enabled"  :  "enabled",
    "disabled"  :  "disabled",
    "all"  :  "",
    "app-service"  :  "",
    "defaults-from"  :  "",
    "description"  :  "",
    "match-across-pools"  :  "",
    "match-across-services"  :  "",
    "match-across-virtuals"  :  "",
    "mirror"  :  "",
    "override-connection-limit"  :  "",
    "sip-info"  :  "",
    "timeout"  :  "",
}
'''


#------------------------------------------------------
# SAMPLE OUTPUT 
#------------------------------------------------------
'''
{
    "status"  :  "success",
    "pre_validation"  :   [{"device_name":"test_device_001","operation_type":"create","commands":["tmsh list ltm persistence sip test001"],"data":[]}] ,
    "post_validation"  :  [{"device_name":"test_device_001","operation_type":"create","commands":["tmsh list ltm persistence sip test001"],"data":[]}] ,
    "implementation"  :   [{"device_name":"test_device_001","operation_type":"create","commands":["tmsh create ltm persistence sip test001"],"data":[]}] ,
    "partial_rollback"  : [{"device_name":"test_device_001","operation_type":"create","commands":["tmsh delete ltm persistence sip test001"],"data":[]}] ,
    "rollback"  :  [{"input_dict":{},"config_before_modification":"configuration snippets...","config_before_modification_all_properties":"configuration snippets...","config_after_modification":"configuration snippets..."}]
}
'''


#------------------------------------------------------
# IMPORTS 
#------------------------------------------------------
null = None
false = False
true = True
sys.path.insert(0,AVX::HELPER)
sys.path.insert(0,AVX::DEPENDENCIES)

import json
import traceback
import oob_task_utility
import oob_constants
import commandrepoconnectorv2 as command_repo_connector
import diff_util_modify_delete_rollback as diff_util_modify_delete_rollback
import logger_util
import tmsh_util

session_id = '<%sessionId%>'
IS_DETAILED_LOG_IN_FILE = True
logger = logger_util.get_logger("adc_f5_ltm_persistence sip",file_name='adc_f5_ltm_persistence sip.log')

module = 'ltm'
object_type = 'persistence sip'

#Command Repository action wise indents
command_repo_execute_command    =   'oob-execute-command'
command_repo_indent_implement   =   'oob-implement-f5-ltm-persistence sip'
command_repo_indent_delete      =   'oob-delete-f5-object'
command_repo_indent_list        =   'oob-list-f5-object'

#Generic keys for the task
generic_keys_for_the_task = ['is_skip_required','operation_type','device_name','is_rollback','is_deferred_execution','rollback_input','tabular_input','rollback','name']
list_of_fields_with_replace_all_with_properties = [ ]



#List of fields to be ignored during rollback
list_of_fields_to_be_ignored_during_rollback = ['vs-index','inherit-certkeychain']

#List of fields to be considered during rollback
list_of_fields_to_be_considered_during_rollback = {'disabled','enabled'}

#Device Response Message - Error Recognize
error_messages_pre_validation = ['was not found']
error_messages_implementation_regex = ['was not found', 'unknown property','already exists in partition', 'Error','Duplicate']

device_response_error_check = {}
create = {}
device_response_error_check['create'] = create
create['pre_validation'] = {'list_of_messages':error_messages_pre_validation,'availability':True,'indent':command_repo_indent_list}
create['implementation']={'list_of_messages':error_messages_implementation_regex,'availability':False,'indent':command_repo_indent_implement}
create['post_validation'] = {'list_of_messages':error_messages_pre_validation,'availability':False,'indent':command_repo_indent_list}
create['rollback']={'list_of_messages':error_messages_implementation_regex,'availability':False,'indent':command_repo_indent_delete}

delete = {}
device_response_error_check['delete'] = delete
delete['pre_validation'] = {'list_of_messages':error_messages_pre_validation,'availability':False,'indent':command_repo_indent_list}
delete['implementation']={'list_of_messages':error_messages_implementation_regex,'availability':False,'indent':command_repo_indent_delete}
delete['post_validation'] = {'list_of_messages':error_messages_pre_validation,'availability':True,'indent':command_repo_indent_list}
delete['rollback']={'list_of_messages':error_messages_implementation_regex,'availability':False,'indent':command_repo_execute_command}

modify = {}
device_response_error_check['modify'] = modify
modify['pre_validation'] = {'list_of_messages':error_messages_pre_validation,'availability':False,'indent':command_repo_indent_list}
modify['implementation']={'list_of_messages':error_messages_implementation_regex,'availability':False,'indent':command_repo_indent_implement}
modify['post_validation'] = {'list_of_messages':error_messages_pre_validation,'availability':False,'indent':command_repo_indent_list}
modify['rollback']={'list_of_messages':error_messages_implementation_regex,'availability':False,'indent':command_repo_execute_command}


#Method to get input
def generate_input():
    log_util('generate_input - Started Input Generator',True)
    input_dict = {}

    input_dict['all'] = '<%all%>'
    input_dict['app-service'] = '<%app-service%>'
    input_dict['defaults-from'] = '<%defaults-from%>'
    input_dict['description'] = '<%description%>'
    input_dict['match-across-pools'] = '<%match-across-pools%>'
    input_dict['match-across-services'] = '<%match-across-services%>'
    input_dict['match-across-virtuals'] = '<%match-across-virtuals%>'
    input_dict['mirror'] = '<%mirror%>'
    input_dict['override-connection-limit'] = '<%override-connection-limit%>'
    input_dict['sip-info'] = '<%sip-info%>'
    input_dict['timeout'] = '<%timeout%>'

    input_dict['is_skip_required'] = oob_task_utility.is_skip_required('<%is_skip_required%>')
    input_dict['device_name'] = '<%device_name%>'
    input_dict['is_rollback'] = oob_task_utility.get_boolean_field('<%is_rollback%>')
    input_dict['rollback_input'] = '<%rollback_input%>'
    input_dict['is_deferred_execution'] = oob_task_utility.get_boolean_field('<%is_deferred_execution%>')
    input_dict['name'] = '<%name%>'
    input_dict['enabled'] = '<%enabled%>'
    input_dict['is_stop_workflow_on_failure'] = oob_task_utility.get_boolean_field('<%is_stop_workflow_on_failure%>')
    input_dict['operation_type'] = oob_task_utility.get_default_operation_type('<%operation_type%>')
    input_dict['is_bash_shell'] = tmsh_util.is_bash_shell(input_dict['device_name'],session_id)
    input_dict['tabular_input'] = <%tabular_input%>
    input_dict['module'] = 'ltm'
    input_dict['object_type'] = 'persistence sip'

    log_util('generate_input - Input Received : '+str(input_dict),True)
    log_util('generate_input - Completed Input Generator',True)
    return input_dict

#Method to process tabular data
def process_tabular_data(input_dict_main):
    log_util('process_tabular_data - Started Processing tabular input',True)
    tabular_input = input_dict_main['tabular_input']
    list_input_data = []

    if tabular_input!=None and len(tabular_input)>0:
        for table_input_member in tabular_input:
            log_util('process_tabular_data - Input dict generation :'+str(table_input_member),True)
            input_dict = {}
            input_dict['all'] = table_input_member['all'] if 'all' in table_input_member else None
            input_dict['app-service'] = table_input_member['app-service'] if 'app-service' in table_input_member else None
            input_dict['defaults-from'] = table_input_member['defaults-from'] if 'defaults-from' in table_input_member else None
            input_dict['description'] = table_input_member['description'] if 'description' in table_input_member else None
            input_dict['match-across-pools'] = table_input_member['match-across-pools'] if 'match-across-pools' in table_input_member else None
            input_dict['match-across-services'] = table_input_member['match-across-services'] if 'match-across-services' in table_input_member else None
            input_dict['match-across-virtuals'] = table_input_member['match-across-virtuals'] if 'match-across-virtuals' in table_input_member else None
            input_dict['mirror'] = table_input_member['mirror'] if 'mirror' in table_input_member else None
            input_dict['override-connection-limit'] = table_input_member['override-connection-limit'] if 'override-connection-limit' in table_input_member else None
            input_dict['sip-info'] = table_input_member['sip-info'] if 'sip-info' in table_input_member else None
            input_dict['timeout'] = table_input_member['timeout'] if 'timeout' in table_input_member else None

            input_dict['device_name'] = table_input_member['device_name'] if 'device_name' in table_input_member else input_dict_main['device_name']
            input_dict['is_rollback'] = oob_task_utility.get_boolean_field(table_input_member['is_rollback'] if 'is_rollback' in table_input_member else input_dict_main['is_rollback'])
            input_dict['rollback_input'] = table_input_member['rollback_input'] if 'rollback_input' in table_input_member else input_dict_main['rollback_input']
            input_dict['is_deferred_execution'] = oob_task_utility.get_boolean_field(table_input_member['is_deferred_execution'] if 'is_deferred_execution' in table_input_member else input_dict_main['is_deferred_execution'])
            input_dict['name'] = table_input_member['name'] if 'name' in table_input_member else input_dict_main['name']
            input_dict['enabled'] = table_input_member['enabled'] if 'enabled' in table_input_member else None
            input_dict['operation_type'] = oob_task_utility.get_default_operation_type(table_input_member['operation_type'] if 'operation_type' in table_input_member else None)
            input_dict['is_bash_shell'] = tmsh_util.is_bash_shell(input_dict['device_name'],session_id)
            input_dict['module'] = 'ltm'
            input_dict['object_type'] = 'persistence sip'
            list_input_data.append(input_dict)
    else:
        list_input_data.append(input_dict_main)

    log_util('process_tabular_data - Input dict generated list :'+str(list_input_data),True)
    log_util('process_tabular_data - Completed Processing tabular input',True)
    return list_input_data

def output_util(input,status):
    log_util('Main - '+str(input),True)
    if status!=None:
        AVX::OUTPUT(input,status)
    else:
        AVX::OUTPUT(input)

def log_util(input_str,is_studio_log):
    if IS_DETAILED_LOG_IN_FILE:
        logger.info(input_str)
    if is_studio_log:
        AVX::LOG(input_str)

# action - task action like create / delete / modify
# activity - pre_validation, implementation, post_validation, rollback
def carry_out_action_wise_object_activity(activity,input_dict):
    log_util('carry_out_action_wise_object_activity - carry_out_action_wise_object_activity - input_dict :'+str(input_dict),False)

    operation_type = input_dict['operation_type']
    response = command_repo_connector.command_repo_connector(session_id,device_response_error_check[operation_type][activity]['indent'],input_dict['is_deferred_execution'],{k:v for k,v in input_dict.items() if v is not None})
    if input_dict['is_deferred_execution']:
        return response
    elif ( device_response_error_check[operation_type][activity]['availability'] and any(error in str(response['data']) for error in device_response_error_check[operation_type][activity]['list_of_messages']) ) or ( ( not device_response_error_check[operation_type][activity]['availability'] ) and ( not any(error in str(response['data']) for error in device_response_error_check[operation_type][activity]['list_of_messages']))):
        return response
    else:
        raise Exception('Error :' + input_dict['name'] + str(response['data']))

#Method to handle partial rollback
def partial_rollback(input_dict):
    operation_type = input_dict['operation_type']
    return command_repo_connector.command_repo_connector(session_id,device_response_error_check[operation_type]['rollback']['indent'],True,{k:v for k,v in input_dict.items() if v is not None})

def get_config_from_device(input_dict,is_deferred_execution):
    return command_repo_connector.command_repo_connector(session_id,command_repo_indent_list,is_deferred_execution,{k:v for k,v in input_dict.items() if v is not None})

def get_config_for_all_properties_from_device(input_dict,is_deferred_execution):
    payload = {k:v for k,v in input_dict.items() if v is not None}
    payload['all_properties'] = True
    return command_repo_connector.command_repo_connector(session_id,command_repo_indent_list,is_deferred_execution,payload)

def get_non_none_and_generic(input):
    input_with_non_none = {k:v for k,v in input.items() if ( (v is not None ) and ( v is not ''))}
    for key in generic_keys_for_the_task:        
        if key in input_with_non_none:
            del input_with_non_none[key]
    return input_with_non_none

#Method to handle rollback
def execute_rollback(rollback_input,is_skip_deferred):
    output = []        
    for rollback_dict in rollback_input:
        log_util('execute_rollback - Executing rollback for the input :'+str(rollback_dict),False)
        input_dict = rollback_dict['input_dict']
        device_name = input_dict['device_name']
        input_dict['is_deferred_execution'] = input_dict['is_deferred_execution'] if 'is_deferred_execution' in input_dict else None
        if is_skip_deferred and  input_dict['is_deferred_execution']:
            continue
        operation_type = input_dict['operation_type']
        current_output_dict = {}
        current_output_dict['device_name'] = input_dict['device_name']
        current_output_dict['operation_type'] = input_dict['operation_type']
        modify_dict_with_out_none_and_generic_fields = get_non_none_and_generic(input_dict)
        if input_dict['operation_type'] == 'create':
            response = command_repo_connector.command_repo_connector(session_id,device_response_error_check[operation_type]['rollback']['indent'],input_dict['is_deferred_execution'],{k:v for k,v in input_dict.items() if v is not None})
        elif input_dict['operation_type'] == 'modify':
            command_from_util = diff_util_modify_delete_rollback.get_modification_rollback_command(rollback_dict['config_before_modification_all_properties'],rollback_dict['config_before_modification'],modify_dict_with_out_none_and_generic_fields.keys(),list_of_fields_with_replace_all_with_properties,list_of_fields_to_be_ignored_during_rollback,list_of_fields_to_be_considered_during_rollback)
            command_from_util = 'modify '+module+' ' + object_type + get_record_type_command(input_dict) + input_dict['name']+' {'+command_from_util+' }'
            if input_dict['is_bash_shell']:
                command_from_util = 'tmsh '+command_from_util
            form_fields_command_repo = {'device_name':device_name,'command':command_from_util}
            if input_dict['is_deferred_execution']:
                response = {'commands':[command_from_util],'data':[]}
            else:
                response = command_repo_connector.command_repo_connector(session_id,device_response_error_check[operation_type]['rollback']['indent'],input_dict['is_deferred_execution'],form_fields_command_repo)
        elif input_dict['operation_type'] == 'delete':
            command_from_util = diff_util_modify_delete_rollback.get_delete_rollback_command(rollback_dict['config_before_modification'],list_of_fields_with_replace_all_with_properties,list_of_fields_to_be_ignored_during_rollback)
            command_from_util = 'create '+module+' ' + object_type + get_record_type_command(input_dict) + input_dict['name'] +' {'+command_from_util+' }'
            if input_dict['is_bash_shell']:
                command_from_util = 'tmsh '+command_from_util
            form_fields_command_repo = {'device_name':device_name,'command':command_from_util}
            if input_dict['is_deferred_execution']:
                response = {'commands':[command_from_util],'data':[]}
            else:
                response = command_repo_connector.command_repo_connector(session_id,device_response_error_check[operation_type]['rollback']['indent'],input_dict['is_deferred_execution'],form_fields_command_repo)

        current_output_dict['commands'] = response['commands'] if len(response['commands']) > 0 and input_dict['is_deferred_execution'] else []
        current_output_dict['data'] = response['data'] if len(response['data']) > 0 else []
        log_util('execute_rollback - Current Rollback output :'+str(current_output_dict),False)    
        output.append(current_output_dict)
    log_util('execute_rollback - Rollback Finished ',True)
    return output

def get_record_type_command(input):
    if 'record_type' in input:
        return ' '+input['record_type'] if ( input['record_type'] != None and input['record_type'] != '' ) else ' '
    else:
        return ' '

def carry_out_implementation_activity_for_tabular_input(tabular_input,output):
    log_util('carry_out_implementation_activity_for_tabular_input - Started Implementation',True)
    activity_output = []
    i = 0
    for input_dict in tabular_input:
        log_util('carry_out_implementation_activity_for_tabular_input - Processing input_dict - Operation Type : '+str(input_dict['operation_type']),True)
        log_util('carry_out_implementation_activity_for_tabular_input - input_dict :'+str(input_dict),True)

        rollback_for_current_input_dict = {}        
        rollback_for_current_input_dict['input_dict'] = input_dict
        rollback_for_current_input_dict['config_before_modification'] = output['pre_validation'][i]['data'][0]
        i = i+1

        config_for_all_properties = get_config_for_all_properties_from_device(input_dict,False)['data'][0]
        log_util('carry_out_implementation_activity_for_tabular_input - config_for_all_properties :'+str(config_for_all_properties),False)
        
        #Removing unwanted content from list all-properties
        if module+' ' + object_type + get_record_type_command(input_dict) + input_dict['name'] in config_for_all_properties:
            config_for_all_properties = config_for_all_properties[config_for_all_properties.index(module+' '+object_type+get_record_type_command(input_dict)+input_dict['name']):]

        rollback_for_current_input_dict['config_before_modification_all_properties'] = config_for_all_properties

        output_from_command_repo = carry_out_action_wise_object_activity('implementation',input_dict)
        log_util('carry_out_implementation_activity_for_tabular_input - output_from_command_repo'+str(output_from_command_repo),True)
        if(not input_dict['is_deferred_execution']):
            config = get_config_from_device(input_dict,input_dict['is_deferred_execution'])
            rollback_for_current_input_dict['config_after_modification'] = config['data'][0]

        output_dict = {}
        output_dict['device_name'] = input_dict['device_name']
        output_dict['data'] = output_from_command_repo['data']
        output_dict['commands'] = output_from_command_repo['commands'] if input_dict['is_deferred_execution'] else []
        output_dict['operation_type'] = input_dict['operation_type']
        log_util('carry_out_implementation_activity_for_tabular_input - Implementation Output Dict :'+str(output_dict),False)
        log_util('carry_out_implementation_activity_for_tabular_input - rollback_for_current_input_dict :'+str(rollback_for_current_input_dict),False)

        activity_output.append(output_dict)

        output['rollback'].append(rollback_for_current_input_dict)
        output['object_names'].append(input_dict['name'])

    log_util('carry_out_implementation_activity_for_tabular_input - Finished Implementation',True)
    return activity_output

def carry_out_pre_validation_activity_for_tabular_input(tabular_input):
    log_util('carry_out_pre_validation_activity_for_tabular_input - Carrying out pre_validation',True)
    activity_output = []
    for input_dict in tabular_input:
        config_data = get_config_from_device(input_dict,False)
        output_dict = {}
        output_dict['device_name'] = input_dict['device_name']
        output_dict['data'] = config_data['data']
        output_dict['commands'] = config_data['commands'] if input_dict['is_deferred_execution'] else []
        output_dict['operation_type'] = input_dict['operation_type']
        activity_output.append(output_dict)
        log_util('carry_out_pre_validation_activity_for_tabular_input - Validation Output :'+str(output_dict),False)
    log_util('carry_out_pre_validation_activity_for_tabular_input - Finished pre_validation',True)
    return activity_output

def carry_out_post_validation_activity_for_tabular_input(tabular_input):
    log_util('carry_out_post_validation_activity_for_tabular_input - Carrying out post_validation',True)
    activity_output = []
    for input_dict in tabular_input:
        config_data = get_config_from_device(input_dict,input_dict['is_deferred_execution'])
        output_dict = {}
        output_dict['device_name'] = input_dict['device_name']
        output_dict['data'] = config_data['data']
        output_dict['commands'] = config_data['commands'] if input_dict['is_deferred_execution'] else []
        output_dict['operation_type'] = input_dict['operation_type']
        activity_output.append(output_dict)
        log_util('carry_out_post_validation_activity_for_tabular_input - Validation Output :'+str(output_dict),False)
    log_util('carry_out_post_validation_activity_for_tabular_input - Finished post_validation',True)
    return activity_output

def generate_partial_rollback_commands(rollback_input):
    log_util('generate_partial_rollback_commands - Started generation of partial rollback commands',True)
    output = []        
    for rollback_dict in rollback_input:
        log_util('generate_partial_rollback_commands_from_rollback - Generating Partial Rollback Command :'+str(rollback_dict),False)
        input_dict = rollback_dict['input_dict']
        device_name = input_dict['device_name']
        operation_type = input_dict['operation_type']

        current_output_dict = {}
        current_output_dict['device_name'] = input_dict['device_name']
        current_output_dict['operation_type'] = input_dict['operation_type']
        modify_dict_with_out_none_and_generic_fields = get_non_none_and_generic(input_dict)
        if input_dict['operation_type'] == 'create':
            response = command_repo_connector.command_repo_connector(session_id,device_response_error_check[operation_type]['rollback']['indent'],True,{k:v for k,v in input_dict.items() if v is not None})
            current_output_dict['commands'] = response['commands'] if len(response['commands']) > 0 else []
            current_output_dict['data'] = response['data'] if len(response['data']) > 0 else []

        elif input_dict['operation_type'] == 'modify':
            command_from_util = diff_util_modify_delete_rollback.get_modification_rollback_command(rollback_dict['config_before_modification_all_properties'],rollback_dict['config_before_modification'],modify_dict_with_out_none_and_generic_fields.keys(),list_of_fields_with_replace_all_with_properties,list_of_fields_to_be_ignored_during_rollback,list_of_fields_to_be_considered_during_rollback)
            command_from_util = 'modify '+module+' ' + object_type + ' ' +get_record_type_command(input_dict) + ' ' +input_dict['name']+' {'+command_from_util+' }'
            if input_dict['is_bash_shell']:
                command_from_util = 'tmsh '+command_from_util
                
            current_output_dict['commands'] = [command_from_util]
            current_output_dict['data'] = []
            

        elif input_dict['operation_type'] == 'delete':
            command_from_util = diff_util_modify_delete_rollback.get_delete_rollback_command(rollback_dict['config_before_modification'],list_of_fields_with_replace_all_with_properties,list_of_fields_to_be_ignored_during_rollback)
            command_from_util = 'create '+module+' ' + object_type + ' ' +get_record_type_command(input_dict) + ' ' +input_dict['name']+' {'+command_from_util+' }'            
            if input_dict['is_bash_shell']:
                command_from_util = 'tmsh '+command_from_util

            current_output_dict['commands'] = [command_from_util]
            current_output_dict['data'] = []
        
        log_util('execute_rollback - Current Rollback output :'+str(current_output_dict),False)    
        output.append(current_output_dict)
    log_util('execute_rollback - Rollback Finished ',True)
    return output

def set_skip_message(output):
    output['status'] = 'skipped'
    output['message'] = 'task execution skipped'
    output_util(output,None)

def get_pre_validation_status(list_of_pre_validation_input):
    log_util('get_pre_validation_status - Started pre_validation status',True)
    pre_validation_status = True

    for pre_validation_input in list_of_pre_validation_input:
        log_util('get_pre_validation_status - Processing pre_validation_input :'+str(pre_validation_input),False)
        operation_type = pre_validation_input['operation_type']
        current_status =  ( device_response_error_check[operation_type]['pre_validation']['availability'] and any(error in str(pre_validation_input['data']) for error in device_response_error_check[operation_type]['pre_validation']['list_of_messages']) ) or ( ( not device_response_error_check[operation_type]['pre_validation']['availability'] ) and ( not any(error in str(pre_validation_input['data']) for error in device_response_error_check[operation_type]['pre_validation']['list_of_messages'])))
        pre_validation_status = pre_validation_status and current_status        
        log_util('get_pre_validation_status - pre_validation_status :'+str(pre_validation_status),True)

        if not pre_validation_status:
            log_util('get_pre_validation_status - Pre validation failed in Data :'+str(pre_validation_input['data'])+' Command :'+str(pre_validation_input['commands'])+' Data : '+str(pre_validation_input),True)
            break;
    log_util('get_pre_validation_status - Finished pre_validation status',True)
    return pre_validation_status

def is_input_validation_success(input_data_dict):
    output = True
    log_util('Started validating user input ',True)
    for input_dict in input_data_dict:
        if ( 'enabled' in input_dict and 'disabled' in input_dict ) and ( ((True if input_dict['enabled'] else False) and (True if input_dict['disabled'] else False) ))  :
            output = False
            log_util('enable disable bot are set to true :'+str(input_dict),True)
    log_util('Completed validating user input ',True)
    return output

if __name__ == '__main__':
    log_util('Main - Started Task : ltm-persistence sip',True)
    output = {}    
    #Rollback with sequence number in the forward flow of execution    
    input_dict_main = {}

    
    try:
        #Get the input from the global
        input_dict_main = generate_input()

        if input_dict_main['is_skip_required']:
            log_util('Main - Skipping the Task Execution',True)
            #To skip the task execution
            set_skip_message(output)
        else:
            #Handle tabular input
            input_data_dict = process_tabular_data(input_dict_main)

            input_validation_status = is_input_validation_success(input_data_dict)

            if not input_validation_status:
                log_util('User input validation failed',True)
                output['status'] = 'failed'
                output_util(output,2 if input_dict_main['is_stop_workflow_on_failure'] else None)
            elif not input_dict_main['is_rollback']:
                log_util('Main - Implementation Action :'+str(input_dict_main['operation_type'])+' started ',True)
                output['rollback'] = []
                output['object_names'] = []

                output['pre_validation'] = carry_out_pre_validation_activity_for_tabular_input(input_data_dict)
                pre_validation_status = get_pre_validation_status(output['pre_validation'])
                if pre_validation_status:
                    output['implementation'] = carry_out_implementation_activity_for_tabular_input(input_data_dict,output)
                    output['post_validation'] = carry_out_post_validation_activity_for_tabular_input(input_data_dict)                                
                    output['partial_rollback'] = generate_partial_rollback_commands(output['rollback'])
                    output['status'] = 'success'
                    output_util(output,None,)
                else:
                    log_util('Main - Prevalidation Failed ',True)
                    output['status'] = 'failed'
                    output_util(output,2 if input_dict_main['is_stop_workflow_on_failure'] else None)
            else:
                if input_dict_main['rollback_input'] == '' or input_dict_main['rollback_input'] == None:
                    log_util('Main - Rollback input is none',True)
                    raise Exception('Rollback input is none')
                else:
                    log_util('Main - Rollback Started ',True)
                    log_util('Main - rollback_input :'+str(input_dict_main['rollback_input']),False)
                    rollback_output = execute_rollback(input_dict_main['rollback_input'],False)
                    log_util('Main - rollback_output :'+str(rollback_output),True)
                    output['rollback_output'] = rollback_output
                    output['status'] = 'success'
                    output_util(output,None)            
    except Exception as exception:
        error_trace = traceback.format_exc()
        log_util('Main - error_trace :'+str(error_trace),True)
        log_util('Main - Exception received '+str(exception),True)
        output = {}
        output['status'] = 'failed'
        output['error'] = str(exception)
        if 'rollback' in output:
            execute_rollback(output['rollback'],True)        
        output_util(output,2 if input_dict_main['is_stop_workflow_on_failure'] else None)

tasks.description: This task is used to create / delete / modify the specified DNS Infoblox record. It can generate rest for api or execute the operation immediately
tasks.scriptContent:
#------------------------------------------------------
# TASK DESCRIPTION 
#------------------------------------------------------
'''
Operation Type     : create / delete / modify 
Module         : ltm
Object         : persistence universal




This OOB Task is to create / delete / modify the persistence universal in the module ltm. ( Type of operation to be specified in 'operation_type' )

     - "is_deferred_execution" flag can be set to generate the commands or unset to execute immediately for carrying out the required operation with in the workflow.
     - "is_rollback" can be set along with 'rollback_input' to carryout the rollback operation. ( ' rollback ' of previous execution to be fed to ' rollback_input' ) 
     - "is_skip_required" flag can be set to skip the execution of this task in the work flow.
     - "is_stop_workflow_on_failure" flag can be set to stop the workflow execution in case of failure.
     - "tabular_input" ( list of json ) can be used for carrying out multiple object operations, with same input json format in a list.
     - Using the tabular input the actions can be mixed, like create and modify actions can be carried out in one go as well as the rollback of them 
     - Prevalidation and Postvalidation will be carried out before and after implementation
'''


#------------------------------------------------------
# INPUT DETAILS 
#------------------------------------------------------
'''
[
    { 'field_name' : 'operation_type',    'is_mandatory' : true,    'description' : 'Specify the operation to be carried out on the object ( create / modify / delete )' ,    'type' : 'string'},    
    { 'field_name' : 'device_name',    'is_mandatory' : true,    'description' : 'Device Name managed by AppViewX' ,    'type' : 'string','supported_operations':'create / modify / delete'},    
    { 'field_name' : 'is_rollback',    'is_mandatory' : false,    'description' : 'Flag to carryout the rollback' ,    'type' : 'json','supported_operations':'create / modify / delete'},    
    { 'field_name' : 'is_deferred_execution',    'is_mandatory' : false,    'description' : 'Flag to carryout the deferred execution' ,    'type' : 'string','supported_operations':'create / modify / delete'},    
    { 'field_name' : 'is_skip_required','is_mandatory' : false,    'description' : 'Set this flag to skip the task execution ( default False )' ,    'type' : 'bool','supported_operations':'create / modify / delete'},        
    { 'field_name' : 'is_stop_workflow_on_failure','is_mandatory' : false,    'description' : 'Set this flag to stop the workflow on failure of this task ( default False )' ,    'type' : 'bool','supported_operations':'create / modify / delete'},    
    { 'field_name' : 'rollback_input','is_mandatory' : false,    'description' : 'Input data for the rollback' ,    'type' : 'string','supported_operations':'create / modify / delete'},    
    { 'field_name' : 'tabular_input','is_mandatory' : false,    'description' : 'Input data for the rollback' ,    'type' : 'json','supported_operations':'create / modify / delete'},    

    { 'field_name' : 'name','is_mandatory' : true,    'description' : 'Name of the Object' ,    'type' : 'string','supported_operations':'create / modify / delete'},    
    { 'field_name' : 'enabled','is_mandatory' : false,    'description' : 'Set this flag to enable the object' ,    'type' : 'bool','supported_operations':'create / modify '},    
    { 'field_name' : 'app-service', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies the name of the application service to which the profile belongs. The default value is ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'defaults-from', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies the existing profile from which the system imports settings for the new profile. The default value is ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'description', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'User defined description.', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'match-across-pools', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies, when ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'match-across-services', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies, when ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'match-across-virtuals', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies, when ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'method', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : '', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'mirror', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies whether the system mirrors persistence records to the high-availability peer. The default value is ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'override-connection-limit', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies, when ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'rule', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies an iRule name when you are using a rule for universal persistence.', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
    { 'field_name' : 'timeout', 'is_mandatory' : false, 'description' : 'Specifies the duration of the persistence entries. The default value is ', 'type' : 'string', 'supported_operations':' create / modify ', 'supported_versions' = ['v11','v12','v13','v14']},    
]
'''


#------------------------------------------------------
# SAMPLE INPUT 
#------------------------------------------------------
'''
{
    "operation_type"  :  "create",
    "device_name"  :  "Test_Device",
    "is_rollback"  :  "false",
    "is_deferred_execution"  :  "true",
    "is_skip_required" :"true",
    "is_stop_workflow_on_failure":"true",
    "rollback_input"  :  [],
    "tabular_input"  :  [{"name":"test_object_010" ... }],
    "name"  :  "test_object_001",
    "enabled"  :  "enabled",
    "disabled"  :  "disabled",
    "app-service"  :  "",
    "defaults-from"  :  "",
    "description"  :  "",
    "match-across-pools"  :  "",
    "match-across-services"  :  "",
    "match-across-virtuals"  :  "",
    "method"  :  "",
    "mirror"  :  "",
    "override-connection-limit"  :  "",
    "rule"  :  "",
    "timeout"  :  "",
}
'''


#------------------------------------------------------
# SAMPLE OUTPUT 
#------------------------------------------------------
'''
{
    "status"  :  "success",
    "pre_validation"  :   [{"device_name":"test_device_001","operation_type":"create","commands":["tmsh list ltm persistence universal test001"],"data":[]}] ,
    "post_validation"  :  [{"device_name":"test_device_001","operation_type":"create","commands":["tmsh list ltm persistence universal test001"],"data":[]}] ,
    "implementation"  :   [{"device_name":"test_device_001","operation_type":"create","commands":["tmsh create ltm persistence universal test001"],"data":[]}] ,
    "partial_rollback"  : [{"device_name":"test_device_001","operation_type":"create","commands":["tmsh delete ltm persistence universal test001"],"data":[]}] ,
    "rollback"  :  [{"input_dict":{},"config_before_modification":"configuration snippets...","config_before_modification_all_properties":"configuration snippets...","config_after_modification":"configuration snippets..."}]
}
'''


#------------------------------------------------------
# IMPORTS 
#------------------------------------------------------
null = None
false = False
true = True
sys.path.insert(0,AVX::HELPER)
sys.path.insert(0,AVX::DEPENDENCIES)

import json
import traceback
import oob_task_utility
import oob_constants
import commandrepoconnectorv2 as command_repo_connector
import diff_util_modify_delete_rollback as diff_util_modify_delete_rollback
import logger_util
import tmsh_util

session_id = '<%sessionId%>'
IS_DETAILED_LOG_IN_FILE = True
logger = logger_util.get_logger("adc_f5_ltm_persistence universal",file_name='adc_f5_ltm_persistence universal.log')

module = 'ltm'
object_type = 'persistence universal'

#Command Repository action wise indents
command_repo_execute_command    =   'oob-execute-command'
command_repo_indent_implement   =   'oob-implement-f5-ltm-persistence universal'
command_repo_indent_delete      =   'oob-delete-f5-object'
command_repo_indent_list        =   'oob-list-f5-object'

#Generic keys for the task
generic_keys_for_the_task = ['is_skip_required','operation_type','device_name','is_rollback','is_deferred_execution','rollback_input','tabular_input','rollback','name']
list_of_fields_with_replace_all_with_properties = [ ]



#List of fields to be ignored during rollback
list_of_fields_to_be_ignored_during_rollback = ['vs-index','inherit-certkeychain']

#List of fields to be considered during rollback
list_of_fields_to_be_considered_during_rollback = {'disabled','enabled'}

#Device Response Message - Error Recognize
error_messages_pre_validation = ['was not found']
error_messages_implementation_regex = ['was not found', 'unknown property','already exists in partition', 'Error','Duplicate']

device_response_error_check = {}
create = {}
device_response_error_check['create'] = create
create['pre_validation'] = {'list_of_messages':error_messages_pre_validation,'availability':True,'indent':command_repo_indent_list}
create['implementation']={'list_of_messages':error_messages_implementation_regex,'availability':False,'indent':command_repo_indent_implement}
create['post_validation'] = {'list_of_messages':error_messages_pre_validation,'availability':False,'indent':command_repo_indent_list}
create['rollback']={'list_of_messages':error_messages_implementation_regex,'availability':False,'indent':command_repo_indent_delete}

delete = {}
device_response_error_check['delete'] = delete
delete['pre_validation'] = {'list_of_messages':error_messages_pre_validation,'availability':False,'indent':command_repo_indent_list}
delete['implementation']={'list_of_messages':error_messages_implementation_regex,'availability':False,'indent':command_repo_indent_delete}
delete['post_validation'] = {'list_of_messages':error_messages_pre_validation,'availability':True,'indent':command_repo_indent_list}
delete['rollback']={'list_of_messages':error_messages_implementation_regex,'availability':False,'indent':command_repo_execute_command}

modify = {}
device_response_error_check['modify'] = modify
modify['pre_validation'] = {'list_of_messages':error_messages_pre_validation,'availability':False,'indent':command_repo_indent_list}
modify['implementation']={'list_of_messages':error_messages_implementation_regex,'availability':False,'indent':command_repo_indent_implement}
modify['post_validation'] = {'list_of_messages':error_messages_pre_validation,'availability':False,'indent':command_repo_indent_list}
modify['rollback']={'list_of_messages':error_messages_implementation_regex,'availability':False,'indent':command_repo_execute_command}

    input_dict['method'] = '<%method%>'
    input_dict['mirror'] = '<%mirror%>'
    input_dict['override-connection-limit'] = '<%override-connection-limit%>'
